xIjUBhj3mvlTXp8-rmE0HA.text: After recommendations of my fellow Yelpers, I had to try dd peckers for their wings.  The wings are really good here and definitely one of the best places in Charlotte.  The wings are big here and the chicken is moist and flavorful and not fried to a crisp like many places.  The Hot Gold flavor is very tasty as others have mentioned.  Love the mustardy flavor to it because I LOOOOVEE mustard anyway I can get it.    The place is small and it's not fancy, pretty much a neighborhood bar that serves food,..good food at that.  For your other enjoyment there are about 10 TVs around the restaurant, 2 video games in the front and a jukebox to the other side of the door.  I sat in the bar area..  The bar stools were very uncomfortable and could use some updating.   Service was spot on considering there were only 2 people working the front.  Price wise, I paid $14 for 15 wings and a tea.  Not too bad considering the size of the wings.

jIi63ABB88j6s0zcEZIubA.text: I would give it 5 stars but we did not have a great waitress. The food is amazing. We ordered 25 wings, cheese fries, and fried spear pickles.  Love the grilled wings

vAmEKxKjlgEn2QeNIruA7w.text: I didn't have high hopes for this place, but wow. We live pretty close to it so we frequent the place. The food is always good and the service is always fast and kind. I love the southern wings and house made chips, but everything I've tried has been great.

Gy8rrGgYIzr2nTBM8rLCxA.text: Found this place by accident after pulling over to take a phone call. Didn't expect much based on the appearance of the place but thought I'd have a snack anyway. I didn't try the wings but I did try the fried mushrooms with ranch dipping sauce. They were fantastic, tastes just like grandma's. Came back the next day for another taste.

2jqx3BcltRNZiHvAlQqbJQ.text: Awesome wings and sauces. Small place that is in desperate need of a makeover. Other bar food is good. The staff is friendly and food is always quick.

tLVW5UUHKjDzjN1txbT6wg.text: It's a decent place! Great wings,fries. Have been here many times, good service. My favorite are the honey hot/hot/garlic hot wings and big basket fries.

Dsbep9D-GJW_vArWseORaA.text: Probably my favorite place to get hot wings. Don't let the exterior fool you. Other highlights include: house made chips, oyster/shrimp Po boys & fried pickles. They serve a variety of different sauces for their wings but definitely try the hot wings! Dive bar feel with great food & friendly staff.

WvqHibJjKi76kNQ8eBuSYQ.text: In for bowl game. Awesome wings. Great fries. Good beers. Awesome service.  Highly recommend.

Jht6kyBQWZjPIbZxmgQyig.text: Pretty solid wings, I recommend the sweet hawaiian ones. they come out real black but don't be scared by the color. Hot gold is also pretty solid and not super hot.  I wanna go there to catch a game.

3k7NN4KyhFLMd1JlxKPp6g.text: Best wings in Charlotte... Try the Hot Ranch or the honey hot bbq.  The onion rings are great also!  Trivia night is fun... The owner usually calls it out and no guest can hide from his crazy offbeat wit.  Usually a good crowd for Monday night football and such and Golden Tee while you wait

dxbw-FOnOWbuokrwI4vPNA.text: Great hole the wall place to grab some wings and beers!  You can get 25 wings with 5 different flavors.  All are really good and good size wings too.  Hidden gem!

wNLje2GYJy59TuYx3_pYkw.text: If yur a pub sports bar food fan this is one of the best ! Food is great. Good craft beer selection only one problem. Small

qkO-lnG_ilHjbITYwjSM8g.text: Best fried pickles in town plus awesome wings. We usually do takeout. Dive bar atmosphere if you eat in. Will remain a favorite!

G5-jsjgj3FjYJ5v1E_JDPw.text: This is a hole in the wall place but their wings are the best in town. Talked this place up to my co-worker who has never been. He had high expectations and love it. If you need your wing fix this is the best place.

y3II6a_BUlA0vwNt1Eaumg.text: Great food and they have gotten better at their service! I always get large chilly cheese fries and Parmesan garlic wings that are cooked perfectly!

1plyKrjEC04v3Nicy0aKWw.text: Best fried pickles in town, and the wings are awesome, too. Super friendly staff. Don't be fooled by the low key appearance. Go inside and have some wings and good sweet tea, and belly up to the bar next to one of the biggest cocks I've seen around here :)

EMiF_2JMzMGI6Sj3uxjgsw.text: I've been on a gluttonous tour of Charlotte's unhealthiest restaurants lately. My latest endeavor was the oddly named wing joint d.d. Peckers in Pineville. I've had my fair share of wings from many a local and chain restaurants, and honestly to me they all seem very similar. Like most wing places, they have a bar, a multitude of TVs, and ample wing flavors. Something unique they offer is their fried broccoli cheese balls, which may induce a heart attack, but at least they taste delicious. Kudos to them for making their wing flavors taste distinct from each other, so many wing joints just douse their wings in different sauces and call it a day, but DD's prepares them with more effort, and my taste buds could tell. Their wings are meaty and tender, and their cheese fries are some of the best I've had. Totally worth the drive to Pineville if you're in the mood for wings.

Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cheese fries

tPvQu8K_b3s3hMOUUNNnMw.text: The wings here are hands down the best I've had outside of Buffalo. It might look like a hole in the wall, but that only adds to the appeal once you've eaten here. Tons of flavors and great sides make DD Peckers our go to for game day food.

dqhdtV9wzvD8hB1LjijibQ.text: Swung in for lunch, this was my first time visiting this establishment.... The wings were fantastic.   They had me lickiing my fingers in glee....  I had the lemon wings with the hot gold sauce...  Culinary work of art....  As Arnold would say, , ''I'll be back''

rGR6sCyjSuAD9m5Y2mjZTQ.text: I'm gonna do you a favor... come here and order 10 'honey hot' flavored wings.  Then go on yelp and thank me.    Take it from a guy who isn't exactly a "die hard chicken wing fan" nor do I enjoy spicy food... these honey hot wings are awesome.  Just the right amount of everything.  The restaurant is easy to miss... it's in a strip mall between the Firestone and Laser Quest.    Can't wait to go back!

al9ST4Zbqq3VZP-8kwZ3wQ.text: The place was average. Wings are ok. Nothing special. They are on the small side. I didn't like the fact that they didn't have Medium as an option. Hot was too much sauce and mild was not enough. This is the ONLY wing place I visited that didn't have Medium. The place is clean. The servers were nice. It is in a low to mid-level plaza that is showing it's age. This place has received accolades, but I can think of a dozen wing places in Charlotte that are better.

ZH36gNg_ZYAKex6bvmVbMQ.text: Best chicken wings in Charlotte, no doubt! These ain't no tiny wings either, they are pretty meaty! They have plenty of different wing sauces & combinations to choose from also. My favorite are the Garlic Parmesan, but the hot gold are pretty dang good as well. I usually don't like lemon pepper, but they have a nice, unique flavor to them at DD Peckers (sorry Rick Ross, these are better than Wing Stop by far).   The restaurant is tiny, but the service is very good and the food comes out quick which is a major plus.

N36eXK7uk2wfl3GBoluUQQ.text: Great wings, cool dive atmosphere loud and brash...nice experience. Service is meh....food comes out pretty quick, and beers are nice and cold. If the waitresses cared a little more I would consideration last star. The gold, hot and garlic Parmesan were all good...try the sampler if it's ur first time

GpPWe3UQWf8f-mJ8K5g03g.text: These are the best wings I've had in charlotte. So glad to have found this hidden gem, it's in an uneventful strip mall and somewhere I'd never just decide to go to while driving by judging by the exterior but wow, the food is amazing!

hRSddO4dwjILdmLW8-Qv4Q.text: I was at Carolina Place and needed a place to have dinner. I found this place on Yelp and it had 4 stars.   It's a small local place located in a strip mall. There's plenty of parking, TV's, and full bar.   We found a table as soon as we entered and the waitress cleaned it pretty quickly. The menu has lots of burgers, wraps, and wings (lots of flavors) available.   I ordered the chicken breast strips on a stick and a side salad. My husband ordered wings in Caribbean flavor and raw fries. The food was just ok. Nothing spectacular. Service was ok too.   I ordered the mild sauce on the side of my chicken breast strips. Personally I think it had a little too much vinegar. The Caribbean sauce my husband had was better. We flagged the waitress down (took a few minutes) and I ordered the honey mustard sauce to replace the mild sauce. It was a little better.   Guess you can just say, dinner was ok. Nothing more.

HedEGMRASHMSmPsrTICndg.text: I was craving wings and decided to check out DD Peckers based on my husbands co workers raving about it. Not impressed. I ended up splitting wings and a buffalo chicken sandwich with my husband and just didn't care for it. The buffalo sauce wasn't very hot and the flavor was pretty bland. Maybe it was an off night. I wouldn't be opposed to trying it again.

k3bs2kDZgZpCnl8zM3EV0Q.text: We were in Charlotte the other night and needed a quick meal before heading home.  In short, the night had been busy and the service suffered because of it.  I would try them again because they served up the best Jamaican style wings I've had in some time.  The chips weren't bad either.

dyj-lBGYHT2uJvKvFHY41g.text: Food is what you expect. Wings are great. They get real busy on weekends and for game time so plan ahead.  Seating is small and ok. We mostly do take out and mostly get wings.  Always great food.

CM6BaEB8LEASx_enSxyT7Q.text: Place is hidden but worth it! We get the sampler platter. My favorite is the hot garlic. It is so flavorful with a kick! Their ranch is awesome. French fries is fresh and always comes piping hot. Side salads are also good. Fried mushrooms are delicious. Be careful biting into them because those are also super hot too. Let it cool down or dip it in ranch first lol. My fiance loves the hot gold flavored wings.

Fqeptgbfq4LtU6N6dB27HQ.text: I met up with a friend for lunch because I saw one of my facebook friends check in here one day.  They commented on how good the wings were. So, I made a mental note to try them out.  I entered the restaurant and greeted my friend.  The waitress (a blonde lady) came over to take my drink order.  She delivered it promptly.  She came back to take our order and once our order came up and she delivered it to the table we NEVER saw her again.  She never returned to refill our drinks or even ask if we needed anything.    There was a guy passing our table, so I stop him and said, "Excuse me sir, I know you are not our waiter, but.."  He abruptly interjected, "Well, I guess I am now, what do you need?" So, I asked for a refill of my drink and he brought it back to the table without saying a word.    So, we are waiting.....and waiting....and waiting....almost afraid to ask for the check.  My friend says to him, "May we have our check?"  He states we have to come over to the bar to pay.   To make matters worse he acted like it was hurting him to talk to us, like we were bothering him.  BUUUUUUUUUT, was chatting it up with the older WHITE gentleman at the table next to us.     I hand him my debit card, he runs the card and then THROWS it into my open hand.  I HAVE NEVER, EVER HAS SUCH A BAD EXPERIENCE IN MY LIFE!!!!! I am standing there staring at him like, NO YOU DID NOT!   I DID NOT leave any tip, and I also took a picture of my receipt just in case they tried to charge a tip on my card.  The food was sub par and the customer service was non-existent!   I will never go there again and I don't recommend it to anyone else.  Especially if you are not of the European decent!     Treva H.

fORyFQo4YXeLehZCnab5Jg.text: The girl who picked up the phone said hold on.  You can hear her in the background speaking with a guy at the bar.  Let's say she was more interested than the guy then picking up the phone. I was on hold for 10 minutes and hung up. It took 8 times for me calling back until she picked up and she apologized.because she forgot I was on hold. It's a shame the food is good but apparently the service has gone down.

NGrJn9W2N5s_dz7TX5Zemw.text: What to say about this dive wing place. A bit hidden off Park Rd Ext in Pineville but once you are there, it's legitimately a great wing place. Is it a dive? Yes. In need of a refresh? Yes. But then again, that's why it is a dive bar. However, in my opinion some of the best wings in town. THE best fried pickles for sure. We had fried pickles---piping hot and you gotta give them a few minutes to cool off. Wings--we did 10 hot and 5 bbq---extra crispy. The hot were a fantastic hot--just what you expect--saucey and HOT. Even the bbq were a bit spicey, or was carryover from the HOT? Also had fries--nothing to write home about. Crinkle cut fries served right from the fryer. The Philly was good too. Bread was way better than I expected, beef was well seasoned.  Overall, great food and definitely a place to check out.

aIufP7w323F-BuS_M0wB8w.text: I gave 3 stars because I'm meeting in the middle. Wings are sooo good--I'd give them 5 stars. However, the service is 1 star. Customer service and satisfying their guest is definitely not a priority for them. While yes, it is a small wing spot, it gets great business but there's never enough servers working. While they usually only have 2 servers working...everything seems like such a hassle for them, and can be very rude. Not welcoming at all. Rude with to go orders, and I have never seen anyone there working with a smile on their face.

plfdfgTcF4QHDgq9PUM50w.text: Waitress was super pleasant and attentive to our  needs. Had the Philly sandwiches, both chicken and steak. They tasted good! Potato salad wasn't my favorite but I'm very picky when it comes with that. Overall nice little place for good food

57Sr3O6nSP6LaDWz7NAXtg.text: I have been looking for a really good wing joint in Charlotte since I moved here a year ago. We stopped by DD Peckers and they have a great sauce selection. We had the hot gold and hot ranch sauces which were both fantastic!  We also had a grilled salad and that was good too. Our server was really sweet and attentive. She forgot to grab us some extra sauce and was very apologetic but she was so busy. Also we had so much sauce on the wings we just added that to the salad. We will definitely be back!

BI1RytxcLnEgISNVHwDHRw.text: Wings were pretty good. I will give them 3 stars. Good size and cooked perfectly. This place does define "dive" so it caused no disappointment as it came as expected.   I got the HOT wings - they were medium to me but tasty. I got the "blazing" sauce on the side and it was not any hotter than the hot sauce. And, it didn't taste like buffalo sauce anymore so I'm glad I ordered the hot wings.

PVczUY8Cd_2J2SOmHQHHBw.text: I sat at this establishment after driving out of my way and it took 5 mins before even getting drink orders. The waitress/bartender literally dropped the drinks down on our table and kept moving. After I motioned several times that we were ready to order I watched our waitress/bartender take several to-go orders, chat it up with other patrons and never once did she come over and take our food order. We waited 30+ mins. before I just walked out my sister stayed but I refused to eat here. People had come and gone that's how long we had been waiting. NEVER AGAIN! And bet your bottom I'll make sure to leave my experience on every website I can find! Absolutely ridiculous!  I get that there were only two servers working but it wasn't terribly busy if she had enough time to do all that other stuff that she couldn't stop 2 mins to take our order.  Update: She told my sister it was a misunderstanding. She thought we weren't ordering anything. That she thought we were waiting on laundry (BULLS***!). Why would I tell you I was trying to pull the menu up on my phone if I wasn't planning on ordering? And in what establishment does a server not come back and ask if you want more to drink or want to order anything even if they aren't sure you plan to order? Try again with someone who might believe that lie!

KFr6yuuoyw8Ew78q0aqMLg.text: Wonderful wings. Hot and spicy! Great homemade chips. The wait staff is fun and informative. Excellent, fun time. Love the hot ranch wings.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

NsEAOhNZ2bHYfHQ4Csr01Q.text: My favorite wing place in Charlotte this far. The servers are friendly and get to know their regular patrons. If you're not there at 11:30 or before on most days, you may arrive to a packed house. I generally get 5 honey hot and 5 hot honey bbq wings. The flavors sound similar but are different.

HNEJVptO_RaQy7wwa_F6QQ.text: This is the best place for wings 2 of my favorites are honey mustard an southern . The honey mustard wings are cooked perfect n the sauce is a creme base yum. The southern wings are like a fried naked chicken wing w a side of gravy . Their fried pickles are to die for they are spears not chips an add some cheese fries perfect Friday nite meal

LEyUg-hH8fb0-7nhDdx2Ug.text: Great joint. Friendly staff. My son and I go every Saturday. Wings are best in town.

YhFWriqMK8OQSKKCd9b5pw.text: If you are looking for some good wings, fries, fried pickes and lots of beer, this is your place.  I have been here many times and the food is always good.

yCn-4zeNrYfJI1xk3TXEyA.text: Best wings I've had in the Charlotte area hands down. Fried pickles aren't bad either. Great hangout spot for drinks, sports or food.

RKMCNyjQSwY143L_h-jDiQ.text: I didn't actually intend to go to DD Peckers Wings.  I was looking for a different restaurant when stumbled across it.  It was on my bookmark list to try, so rather than waste more time looking for the other place, I stopped in there.  I was glad I did.  The place is pretty much a dimly lit dive bar & grille type place.  I ordered some onion rings to start with a and 10 wings with the hot sauce.  My onion rings came out pretty quick.  The rings hand made, hot out of the fryer, with just the right amount of grease.  They were thin with the batter just about falling off and very, very tasty.  They reminded me of the onion rings that my family used to get when we went out to the local fried chicken joint on Sundays as a treat.   I had a little bit of a wait after I finished the rings before my wings came out, but my waitress kept my drink filled.  The wings were a pretty good size and well coated with sauce.  They were steaming hot, temperature wise, and spicy hot flavor wise.  Usually when I order hot it is more like a medium to my palate, but these were truly hot on my spice meter.  The only negative I could find was that they were a little over cooked, but not by much so I couldn't give them 5 stars.  This place is pretty hidden in a strip mall and you'd probably drive right by if you weren't looking for it.  But my recommendation is to look for it and you won't be disappointed.  The price is also very reasonable, $7.50 for 10 wings with a wide range of sauces.  I'm definitely going back there.

0i54RmB0Xr4BjXFxfFiLBg.text: Total dive but for wings in the Charlotte area - they don't get any better than the ones served @ this place. Plus, they have a Silver Strike bowling machine. Good times await ...

EMG1ic-6grFhrjAn4uEwVw.text: Great wings and a fantastic buffalo chicken sandwich! The place is a dive but fun.

SMBGG7GmTcS8NwQ4wOX-1A.text: DD Peckers! You're so cool. Your sketchy outside is contrasted by your warm and inviting inside. Our first time here we were dining around the Pineville fire station AND policemen. We felt very lucky. We ordered mozzarella sticks as an app and the 30 wing sampler as our entree. It was fun trying all of the flavors. My favorite was the mustard. The dry rub we ordered was pretty burnt, which was disappointing. Everything else was great, we will definitely be back.

pTuFulzNy65His2lGXd8Aw.text: this was a great random wing place! we decided to go here because the yelp reviews were stellar. it IS a smaller venue but not cramped at all, really comfortable and the atmosphere is relaxed. THE WINGS AND FRIED PICKLES WERE 10/10. we had the small platter (25 wings) which gives you 5 flavors (5 wings each flavor) honestly the best deal for two people. our server was so sweet and helpful with the menu since it was our first time! def can't wait to go back

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

2YAbu99hiUwSRzd2te1KvA.text: Fact: I sing to myself, "I'm in love with a strip mall" when I come here. This is of course inspired by the great poet T-Pain. It may not look like much, but DD Peckers is a great hidden gem.  I like a lot of the sauces here, so for me it's hard to pick just one. The sampler platter is a great option if you have a few people with you. Twenty-five wings and you can do five different flavors. Hot flavors always win for me when it comes to wings. The heated versions of gold, garlic, honey, teriyaki are all great. Hoisin may sound odd for wings, but it's really delicious.   The fried pickles here are spears instead of chips. WIN. I wish everyone would vote spears when it comes to menu decision making involving fried cucumbers soaked in evil. I also like that you can do most of the starters as a half order instead of a full. I don't think the broccoli cheese balls are made in house, but they are a nice little nibble.  Parking can be kind of difficult in this shopping center. I think that may be a blessing a disguise. I mean, I need that little walk after eating that many wings and fried things dipped in ranch.

Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chili cheese fries
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fried pickles. They use spears!

P6Ezl9r2E89D7qGZMnrvPA.text: Great food but very busy on Monday nights. They charge $1.50 for Ranch and don't advertise the price of condiments or tell you - a bit surprising on the bill to see such a high amount for ranch (could understand .50 cents but $1.50???

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Black and Blue Burger with house chips

DW9P5eITgV5YxhKv1Ic-sg.text: Service was good. Wings were fine.  I wouldn't say they are the best.  But they are good and they are deep fried hot which is really good because this place is grossly dirty inside. If the kitchen looks anything like the bathrooms and the dining area , I hope deep frying these wings killed off any Listeria or E. coli I probably would've eaten. I seriously question the cleanliness of the kitchen. Gordon Ramsay would go nuts.  If you dare to eat here don't touch anything or use your hand sanitizer liberally..

gApivbyNvtuPItDGIeGdhQ.text: I would start with "don't judge a book by its cover" but I don't read; more of a 'watch the movie' guy.  The parking lot is dark and the sign is barely lit but don't let the lack of light darken your outlook on this wing joint.  It's like opening a present wrapped by someone riding a roller coaster.  Rough outside but just delightful inside.  As the self proclaimed "best wings in Charlotte" (it is stated on the menus), I have to say that this claim is not far off.  I have not tired all the wings in Charlotte so I cannot fully endorse this, but I can say they were pretty darn good.  Generous with the sauce, the wings were cooked perfectly.  I also appreciated the plethora of choices when it came to sauces.  I can give my stamp of approval on "Hot Gold" as it had a sweet mustard taste with some heat.  I added a side of house chips that were good, with portions above average.  Service was great as refills were constant.  Would be a great place to watch a game.  Lots of traffic in and out as a steady stream of takeout orders made their way from the kitchen.  Will I be back?  I sure hope so.  I mean try and say "DD Peckers" without a little smile.  See, you can't.

xaWIq2dPvu2sHz0dB3AzYw.text: They are living up to all the hype on their reviews. These wings have a great outer crunch with a tasty not over cooked chicken center.  They offer a wide variety of flavors that all tasted great! I will definitely be returning.

kXEWHc5XhKp3TwFs4GSPYA.text: Wings were good but service always makes everything worse. The wings weren't spectacular I've had better else where. When I called in my order the guy sounded dry and upset that I was ordering. My order wasn't complex 10 wings and poppers. The jalapeno poppers weren't good wouldn't re order or suggest. When I got there my food was sitting in the middle of the bar no itemized receipt to even know what I actually paid per item....  he barely spoke to me I asked was it blue cheese dressing yes I know what I ordered but means nothing. Of course when I got home both sauces were blue cheese. I'll probably never return due to the service alone.

I05BsxJ1EfukYVYHtsFPeA.text: Always awesome, always welcoming and amazing food. Broccoli cheddar balls are to die for. So hot ranch with anything you own.

MRMCjKBlTrIyrFQykco-4g.text: Not impressed  Visited dd Peckers about a week ago and while nice, not outstanding.  My wife had the Chicken Philly and while not great, nothing to write home about.  I had the Buffalo Chicken Sandwich with the Blazing Sauce.  You would expect with blazing, it would be very hot but not the case. Never once had to wipe my brow from sweat and a good medium hot at best.  Still a nice place to go and a dive restaurant but still a good option. Just not a first choice.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

GoWpDe9BaDrkfNvtCoBLUg.text: I decided to try this place after hearing so much hype about it.  When we got inside it reminded me of one of my other favorite spots to get wings. Wing King. Menu was similar as well. We went with the Honey hot wings and fries. They tasted just like the wings at Wing King which is a good thing. My only complaint would be the wings could've used more sauce. I will keep this place in my rotation.

TBr6vHTUcLMQtxYrGJEZDA.text: Incredible disappointing experience, after years of coming to this place, today is sad to say we were completely targeted and treated with the worst kind of disrespect, today for the first time in 20 tears of leaving in Charlotte my family and I were treated with straight up racist ways, from the owner all the way to the people around us playing poker, it's a shame that at this point of progress in our city there is still people so mentally backwards !!!!

yQlS3Hw0oTrH7XQM5JmHKg.text: I feel dirty just walking into this place. I decided to give it more than one shot since I know a few people who love it here, but not again. Also, not sure why people say their food is great... everything I've had from them tastes like rubber. The servers I've had have been nice though, I'll at least give DD's that.

p0n1YKVOv4CitpPAUskVQw.text: Wings are good, but the bartender with the blonde ponytail is racist as shit. I have referred my friends and family to this restaurant for them to come back and say the same thing. Very rude

5rFovVQhuNiyJfomVr0Ytw.text: First time, definitely wont be the last! Overall an incredible experience. Located in the middle of a strip mall, don't let the location or outside appearance fool you...DD Peckers is worth it.  Highlights: - Mild Wings - Garlic Parmesian Wings - Blazing Wings - Fried Pickles  Our family of 5 enjoyed every minute of this genuine wing-shack. And despite the bar & every table full of people, the service was excellent and the food was fast. This is no chain- it's the real deal.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fried pickles!

7Jh15G-phivpnlx6-dUTEQ.text: This was my first and last visit! I ordered the hosin honey,ginger and so called lemon pepper. This was in fact the worst wings experience. The hosin honey was god awful....it was like eating burnt wings with a bitter after taste. The ginger wings were just as bad.The lemon pepper was missing the lemon and pepper...hints to why I referred to them as so called lemon pepper.   I wish the waitress would have informed me of the presentation of the hosin wings since I mention it was my first time visiting the establishment.I ended up tossing the wings after tasting one of each flavor.   I couldn't believe how awful the favors were. What a waste of $15.00.

9ttMlD95kCMrPWsz4AklsA.text: I ordered hot teriyaki wings and cheese fries for lunch. Horrible waste of money. 2 out of the ten wings were undercooked. They were burnt. Or soggy. The flavor was so lacking. I also ordered cheese fries. If you're just going to dump grated cheese on it at least take the time to get it all melted.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Possibly worst wings I&#39;ve ever had. So disappointed.

jzB4ZAht8CN3gf6VAxM-sA.text: Soo this place isn't fancy but it makes for some great people watching (especially with the lovely Amy C ) and they have some damn good wings.   My favorite were the Honey Hot BBQ. Such great flavor on them!!! And you have to try the blue cheese dressing it's totally with it...and the calories associated with it! Ha!   I'm already looking forward to coming back...Wangs anyone?!?

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. 10 wings

D3jy-O0pulDURAsNpqFj1Q.text: They're okay, definitely not the best in Charlotte. It takes a while to even be acknowledged as it's self seat.   I order the "hot" wings and they're pretty good. My partner got lemon pepper and BBQ, there was almost no lemon or pepper on them, the BBQ ones were burnt to a crisp. Disgusting.   There has only been one waitress both times that we've gone.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. &#34;Hot&#34; flavored wings and the half celery that comes with it. It&#39;s honestly half of a regular cut of celery.

bOG_6JznZ4ShSk7XSspMHA.text: Great service and an excellent bbq bacon cheeseburger!  Will definitely be back the next time we are in Charlotte!

hS5NDbzi0QDUWbdv0y-FuA.text: One of Charlotte's best hole-in-the wall restaurants I've tried. Located in a strip mall, it's a little hard to find this gem, but worth looking. Of course, their wings are great. Other than that it's typical bar food, but the chili is amazing if you want to try something new. Everything I've tried has been tasty. What keeps people returning is a locals bar atmosphere. A small staff that work hard is always something to admire and return for. I've been going here for the last few years and the same people are working, the food is still delicious, and the atmosphere hasn't changed. "You wanna go where everyone knows your name" kind of place.

kHNSByGFjMz4jyjwUEQOpg.text: Great wings! A few months back, I wanted to try this place just to avoid getting food from the major wing joints. I ordered pick up and by the time I got there, it was ready and hot. Got home and it tasted so good, had to go over the bones at least once. So yes please check it out.

RXBh_piMqsz_X947eGeMDQ.text: Love thier wings!  Would give 5 stars but sometimes Thiers not enough sauce on wings.  Honey hot is so good!!! The sweet black chicken...omg....and the garlic chicken is good too

scPWH90vDjgaZ0HFpB8p7w.text: If you're looking for wings this is the place. Get there early for lunch as it fills up quick. Wings were meaty and flavor filled. The Lemon Pepper wings were great and the Gold were tasty too.

34ds7BtnbiyQFUPymjLMBw.text: Best wings in Charlotte! Great drink specials as well as an excellent staff. Same crew has been working here for years so you know it's a good spot.   Can't really go wrong with any of the wing flavors; however, my favorite are Cajun and Lemon Pepper. (you have to try the Hot Gold though, it's their most popular I believe). When in doubt, go for the sampler! 25 wings, 5 different flavors.   Don't let the shopping center fool you. This place is a gem.

upPsmuXtnwVH47OZGbZgZw.text: D D Peckers' wing shack is a small family run wing spot hidden in Pineville, NC.   The fried pickle spears complimented with blue cheese dressing are an excellent companion to their arsenal of flavored chicken wings! Don't be discouraged by the tinted windows. D D's is great with awesome value.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. The big Chick on the bar!

kUQo9UclF87uwtucNNCKfw.text: It's a dive, but it has the best wings in town.  Go for 5 x 5 sample platter and you won't be disappointed.

hPkUroGooyB5ZtC56hVIBw.text: Very legit wings, place has multiple different flavors. Crinkle fries are a plus too. Great place to grab a beer and smash some solid bar food. Staff is super friendly as well. I'm actually contemplating an order from them as I write this review.

WCrClxmOuE6e3-HDgkwb4w.text: Tried DD Peckers over the weekend after a friend mentioned them.  I was NOT impressed, wings were honestly just Ok, nothing I would try again.  The broccoli bites where horrible and a waste (dry and not even really any broccoli and cheese filling at all. The fries where dry too... I don't drink but I don't think I would even go back for drunk dive bar food.

GyOToDuaWGRrvg3CwXs2dg.text: Thank you yelp for some of the best wing flavors I've ever tried.   Go with a group of friends and order as many different types as you can. I tried hoisin honey, hot gold, and cajun rub - they were all really delicious. I can't wait to come back here.  Staff is friendly and served us drinks while we wait for our to-go order.  They even gave us napkins when they saw us sneak off a couple wings from the box as we were paying.

y7odueKJKjC5mfPJs9U3wg.text: Wings were burnt to a crisp. I asked for different set. They weren't much different. On top of that, waitress was rude and never checked on me once after bringing second batch. Never checked to see if things were ok. Never refilled my empty glass. Didn't even bring the tab. Waitress just sat at a table with her friends all night long. I had to ask lady behind the bar to ring up my tab. Will NEVER go back.

9ePFWqstCxJBq2NIrzcphQ.text: Sure, it's Super Bowl Sunday, but taking the phone off the hook all afternoon is not cool.  Thought I would email you to let you know and your mailbox is full.  How do you get feedback from your customers?  I've been getting wings here for years and this was about all I could take.  Really???

IxxcBk9MDLxtPnXReOz52Q.text: From the outside, and maybe even when you first walk in, it seems like a total hole in the wall! But don't let that fool you! They are awesome. Great, great food, friendly staff and great prices. My favorites are the mild wings, their cheeseburger and their french fries! My boyfriend says the Oyster Po Boy is the best he's ever had (which surprised us considering we're not near the coast!). And lately, my teenage son keeps asking if we can come back because he loves their bacon cheeseburger! HIGHLY recommend this place!!

N1UrH9vJXnjEKcgN-d4fIA.text: These are the best wings in Charlotte, hands down!!! We've lived here 22 years and have not found better! The southern fried wings with gravy, haven't found anything to compare them to!

E7P5ByoejYx40MkP0dr-3A.text: I am a wing fan and I've been going here for years one of the better places in Pineville and in Ballantyne to get good wings. Parking can be bad but normally you find a spot right up front.

lYTajeoAo4FxRdQKispIHw.text: This place has been on my radar for the past couple of months, but I would never find myself in the position to get to this part of town from where I live.  I did finally get to try it this past weekend, man, have I been missing out!  Don't judge a book by it's cover, this place is easily hidden away in a strip mall off of Park Rd. Extension.  It really lends itself to the whole vibe and feel of the place.  The servers are super relaxed, but you are well attended to... and it really feels like a cool neighborhood regular spot.  We tried the wing sampler... that lets you get 5 different flavors with 25 wings... we thought we would have some left over but within 30min... the plate was clean and I was super happy we decided to eat wings that evening.  On a hot kick.... so we tried the Hot Garlic, Honey Hot, Hot Teriyaki, Jerk, and Lemon Pepper flavors of wings and all of them were pretty awesome.  After trying the five I would definitely get them all again, especially the honey hot.. nice mix of sweet and fire.  My favorite part was looking a the women's restroom door and seeing a sticker that says, "I [heart] Peckers".... sorry I just reverted to a ten year old....  All in all a great experience!  Definitely need to check out trivia night and the other flavors on the menu!

S9uWx0acOZiYONT_QTsMkw.text: I just moved here from South Florida and going out for wings are a huge part of my life. I placed a to go order with the bartender and she was very helpful in describing the sauces and made some very delicious suggestions! After trying the wings I have to admit, they're some of the best I have ever had! I will be returning to this location OFTEN.

jURcDqgVGEngu1A8LLgZIQ.text: I've been going here for years.  I always get the sampler platter (25 wings/5 flavors) and sometimes the fried pickles.  The quality of the food is best when it's not too busy so get here before the panthers games.

qkVCzIZJzfTUFXKv3jZ05Q.text: Food was ok. Oyster wrap had like 2 little oysters in it. Out server was definitely cool though and made the experience nice.

DtM6ZPE7brUH59wgf0aGFw.text: The location is sketchy at best. As I drove up and saw that it had tinted windows and the other types of stores around it, I thought I may need to bring in my gun. Food was better than average for a wing joint. It was definitely packed out for lunch. I've read so much about the wings I was excited to try. They were good.. I would not say the best in CLT. What I did really enjoy was the Shrimp App. I'll be back but I won't make a special trip to do so.

JL9FegmvEK41SyTC7bBVTA.text: New to Charlotte I had been urged to swing by DD Peckers by locals as "The" wing place.  Warned it didn't look like much as it is a pretty pedestrian and unassuming location in a strip mall. Probably adds to the charm. At the end of the day the wings were outstanding, beer was cold, and the atmosphere hopping. I'll add to the word of moth recommendations.

7byIsxgYTnPV4G5WP8-v2A.text: I was craving for some good wings for along time but I wanted to go somewhere new, so my husband found this place online and we decided to check it out. The decoration is really cool, it has more a bar than a restaurant vibe, there is a wall full of license plates from all over the US and outside that is really nice. We started with the broccoli cheese balls, they were good but I would not order them again. It felt like they were missing some key ingredient, if they had bacon with the broccoli and cheese the combination would've been perfect.  I decided to order garlic Parmesan and Hawaiian wings, the Hawaiian is like a teriyaki sauce with pineapples. For my surprise the wings that were supposed to be one of the best in Charlotte were far from this reality.  The Hawaiian wings were burnt and so SALTY I could barely eat 2?- take in mind I was really hungry. The garlic Parmesan was better but blend, no salt at all. Maybe I had bad luck and went on a day the the seasoning got mixed or something like that but I did not like the wings at all.  My husband got a Real Deal Steak Philly with fries. The sandwich was huge and according to him it was good.  The service was great, our waitress was attentive and very courteous, the price was fair but unfortunately the wings were not good at all.

m_LlvRUK7aIRvYhqkmzHpw.text: Wings? IMPECCABLE Service? Marvelous  This wing place really sauces my naan, I love it!

Kdj-_7t57Icw0sphWG-0eg.text: Hands down the best wings in Charlotte. Order the Hot Gold wings, they're fantastic!  Love the vibe inside, as it's like stepping back in time to that great local dive that only the locals know.

JKegcbjEx3RFdjIAtT-26Q.text: 1/26/2019 ! @12:24! Went with my boyfriend for lunch and ended up wasting $30. The wings  were cold except 2 of them but even then they were just warm not even fresh and hot. My shrimp  warp was tasteless and the only thing you can taste is the nasty mild sauce that was inside the wrap. Didn't even finish the plates and just asked for our check to go somewhere to actually eat real food. Not going back when I could probably had a better meal at McDonalds.

4RRFbXxCqUsk0HKKBpeTCA.text: I was served burnt chard wings Called Hoison Honey I complained by phone because they were part of a large  take out order for my family I spoke to the manager and he insisted that they were cooked correctly. xRoR6mS9CEz_n0wHbJoYfQ.text: These wings are damn good. Went for my 2nd time yesterday and took the wife back today for more. And pickle spears deep fried not the chips everyone else does. New #1 spot for me

DixCvA1ssMDdh9JkMYKwBQ.text: Pretty good, went around 11p so only able to order from late night menu. Hot wings,broccoli balls and drinks!!! What u expected no complaints

97zKCZMDuPnd751X0AJFIw.text: Great wings and staff, nice local atmosphere must try. House made chips with the blue cheese a must!

sbxEoSj8FJNRLfLTBalkKQ.text: I've eaten wings across the country even in places where you wouldn't expect wings to be good. Unfortunately, DD Peckers are by FAR the WORST wings I've ever had in my entire life. Paid $85 for 75 wings.3 different flavors from garlic to lemon pepper to hot. Lemon pepper and garlic were so soaked and drowning  in butter you could taste virtually no flavor, in fact I could not tell the difference between the two! Hot wings were fast food or barely even Walmart caliber and devoid of flavor or wetness.  For an establishment that brags excellent wings and has virtually nothing else on the menu this is absolutely shameful and pathetic. I can't help but wonder if I may have just caught the chefs on a bad morning after...I was totally embarrassed in front of my guests.

rRhlXJ-b-niCFWtGF7UMIQ.text: Got the wing platter! Honey hot and hot gold were the best wing flavors!!! Bleu cheese is made in house and is phenomenal!!!

_pPaWEAQIQKyrDDpPLVAFg.text: I've only been here a couple of months, but so far the best wings I've found in Clt. The restaurant itself definitely doesn't look the best, but the wings themselves are very good. I did a take out order of garlic parm, hot honey bbq, and Caribbean. I enjoyed the hot honey bbq the most with the Caribbean as a close second. The garlic parm was ok, but not quite on the level of the others. The wings were had a crispy outside and juicy inside which was great. The prices are about average for wings. This will be my go to wing spot.

SeWKPo4yewvuV2jddRVMPw.text: I've gone in twice for take out. Really friendly bar staff!   First time I got 10 wings (5 lemon pepper/5 honey BBQ). The lemon pepper could've used a little more flavor. Tasted a little plain but wasn't all that bad. Honey BBQ was delish with dripping sauce!   Second time I got 5 hoisin honey and 5 Cajun. The hoisin honey tricked me at the beginning! They looked charred. Black. Look at the pic. Although I feel like these might have been a little overcooked on the outside, they hoisin flavor was still present and the honey drizzled over them fixed it. The Cajun was sandblasted with Cajun run. No complaints with that one. Had a really good kick to it.   Side note: I ordered chips and salsa also. Chips were cold and stale. To be fair, I ordered these at around 10pm...  Overall I'd totally come back to taste all the other flavors!!

Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cajun. Pretty good spice.

1kVxGaIVebsDvOxOBk1rCg.text: Despite the risque title, this hole in the wall sports bar/wing joint is actually very tame and quaint.  No scantily clad wait staff, and it's family-friendly.   The wall is adorned with license plates, and an old school Frogger machine sits in one corner.    I ordered the hot wings and a side of house chips. The wings, as someone else described in a review, have a great balance of a light crunchy outside and are juicy inside.  I really wanted to try multiple flavors, but as many wings places are doing, they charge extra for multiple flavors, even in higher quantities (this makes no sense to me. - a sermon for a later time).  I did notice, though, that they do offers a sampler platter that discounts it a bit more.  The house chips are good and very salty, but were a bit limp. They have a very generous list of flavors for the wings too.  I only tried the hot, but I thought they were great.  I felt bad for the bartender/server here, as she was all by herself doing tables and running bar too.  Which, led to a little more empty glasses and a bit more waiting.  They need a separate person here for table service during the day,    Still, the star of the show is the wings here, and if you come for that, you'll not leave disappointed.  I chose here because my favorite wings in the area, East Coast Wings, was a little too far off my commute today.  Compared to them, they were very close, but ECW still edges them out a bit.

LXYKiZfKEqfPzglyBcMopQ.text: Not impressed. Ordered 10 hot wings to go. Overcooked, dry, sizes varied. 3 "pieces" of celery, 2 were the little middle things that grow at the top, (aka:compost material)? 1 was a real piece of skinny sliced celery! The dressing was good! A Thursday night, not busy. No excuse. I actually would have had better wings at Pizza Hut! That is not a compliment!

srigNhtIVGyBdkXaGxIMnw.text: We've tried to like this place. Have ordered wings about five times and have been disappointed each time. Small and dry

13TkSIFTx50a0rI6lNOkCQ.text: So, I've been to this place a few times, Probably 10 or 12 times in the past year, so heres a review thats Real, Reliable, and Ready for you to read.   93 Cleanliness!   Ok, lets let down to business, So, I read somewhere when I first moved here in July, that DD Peckers was the best wings in Charlotte, I decided to try it and man, the flavors of these wings are awesome, I've tried most of them. here is my Pros and Cons list.   Pros - Cause i always like to start with the good 1) The wings here are fresh and cooked to order, they ALWAYS come out hot, Crunchy and full of flavor. this SEEMS to be the standard around here. anything from appetizers to Wings is always hot off the press just like you like it.  2) The staff here is very friendly, and very accommodating. half this flavor, half that flavor, 2 ranch on the side, all drums. Never a problem. 3) Cool atmosphere, Im gonna upload some pictures but they have a wall with license plates from all over, A nice bar, and Plenty of TV's for your sports coverage!  Cons -  1) Location matters and it was hard to find this place the first time i went to it. Its off of Park Rd at the corner of Park Cedar DR , Between the CVS and Cook Out, BEHIND the Marathon Gas Station and Dynasty Cleaners.  2) It Looks kinda Shady, nothing on the doors and all Blacked out Windows.  3) It's kinda small, 12ish tables and some seating at the bar, but if you come on a game night or at dinner time any night, you'll wait a while.  4) Bathrooms fill up with trash rather quickly. 5) I think they hand wash they're cups, a couple of times I've got a glass with some residue on it, but they happily always bring me a clean glass. only happened twice. 6) Coke Products but no Coke Zero :(  (Personal Vendetta)  This place is AWESOME, I go at least once a week and will continue to be a regular.   Get Charlottes Best Wings at DD Peckers

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Glass Residue talked about in my Review
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Garlic Parm wings
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Broccoli/cheese balls!

Bjdvv3nEkEdNl1nlMf8l6Q.text: Clean restaurant, good food and local beer. I got the cheeseburger with jalapenos and bacon with onion rings. It was all good! Wife got the chicken philly and she said it was really good. Also like the fried pickles.

vK-Jd8ImseF7T1g-VHGejA.text: Damn that shit was good!! This is the best bad food we've had. Divey little neighborhood type bar with no ambience and we didn't care. Service  was great, server knew her shit. We ordered classic burger with fries, Philly cheesy steak with potato salad, and Honey Gold wings.  Cheeseburger cooked only one way, well done.  But it was delicious and juicy. French fries cooked on the well done side like I asked, crispy and delicious. We order half Philly cheesesteak and the size was perfect and big enough. So good. We got pasta salad by mistake and was told to keep it and I'm so glad they did. It was some kind of Mediterranean style with rotini pasta, pepperoncini peppers, feta cheese. So good. The potato salad was like old fashioned homemade with a slightly sweet taste. It was fantastic too. The wings were sauced perfectly and juicy and cooked the way i like em. Blue cheese on the side was creamy and chunky. Everything tasted hot and fresh. Go in, order a beer or a sweet tea and get some wings and burgers. I'm so mad I'm full, but I took leftovers home and I'm eating that shit later!!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Honey Gold wings. Nicely sauces, perfectly cooked. Love Ed the chunky blue cheese, too.
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Got pasta salad by mistake and they had us keep it. Must be like a Greek pasta salad. Man it was good.
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. My cheeseburger. Two patties, only cooked well done. Delicious!!

k2u_ZYLBTU61XaY9AGEbYg.text: I have been going to Peckers for years and I love it. I originally started going because they used to have trivia on Wednesday night. However, once that stopped, the food is delicious enough to keep me coming back. They have an extensive menu so everyone should be able to find something they like. I love the cheese fries, mozzarella cheese sticks, and the side salad as an appetizing. The chicken wings, chicken sticks, sandwiches, and wraps are all great options. They have a ton of sauce choices to choose from. The wait staff have all been there for a while and very friendly. If you're lucky sometimes you'll even catch the owner, Justin, hanging around and he always comes by to check on everything or pitches in when things get busy. It's great to see someone care about their business and not just dictate.

oisp_D6GHHAHIXy1-N2Eyg.text: Go for the Hot Garlic wings with Fries to dip in the sauce.  Great sauce, with LOTS of garlic.  Good cold beer as well.

0EDRju8_7V0rarVfAtowIQ.text: The BEST wings around!!! Great beer specials and the staff is outstanding. For a wing joint their burgers are VERY good as well

do-tLT8c399qE-F39hDspg.text: Kind of a hole in the wall, older place, but I came for the fried pickle spears I saw advertised on Yelp.  They have yummy home made ranch and the breading is crispy and has a good flavor and they use Clausen pickles- or at least that's what they look like.  I haven't tried anything else, except a side salad, which was good.

jCx73_uC58w_mSJ9jOj5PA.text: This is a really fun dive bar. It's small but has a lot of personality. The wings are killer and they usually have some good deals on drinks. This place is great for what it is

kWX0qyss6n-wSmdWLrYDdQ.text: This place is a great dive. The wings are my favorite in Charlotte with a wonderfully-flavorful sauce and not too expensive. Don't expect great service though if there is a crowd.

TVIjB0pTr-CVOqYkj9zi0w.text: I love d.d. Pecker's! There wings are the best! Don't let the divey location scare you away! Great little bar, always has great service - one of our favorite places in Charlotte.

SOuM3HlywXl_nZyIx59nSw.text: The service was okay, but lacked any caring attitude at all!!  Half answered questions and the bonless wings all had nasty gristle in most bites, fried whole pickles, the only thing I enjoyed were the fries and my company!  I hope not to eat here again!

8P-drR9wa9n7ZqjhPYjg6A.text: Listen, I'm not a big chicken wing fan.  Yes I like chicken wings but my tastes aren't well tuned in enough to discern good wings from bad.  That being said, I think D.D. Peckers is A-OK!  I still like the home town feel of the place, the non chicken wing food is actually really good to.  I tried the shrimp salad (was a bit sad to see it come out fried).  It was actually really good though.  Beer specials could've been a little bit better and the selection is a little lacking for me but either way this is a solid 'hood bar with great servers.  Make sure to check out the license frames on the wall for a good laugh.

coYKx1yTEGXL6Z_NRZjrpg.text: First place I ever had a fried pickle. Damn good stuff. The wings are also really good, they offer quite a few odd flavors, but all the ones I tried are very good even combined. I think the Hawaiin and hot teriyaki or something like that is the best. This is like the one place if we are driving to around or through Charlotte, we have to stop :)  Ps: You guys are lucky, we dont have fried pickles in Miami. and if you can find them they suck and are the chip version.

u3HxRKHpksuzqyV6yKC3QA.text: Like wings? Alcohol? Sports? Well, do ya??? Then do yourself a favor slappy... check out this hole in the wall!   Food - You will find your basic bar fare with a nice selection of wings including Blazing, Lemon Pepper, Hawaiian, Hot Gold, Hot Teriyaki and many more. If you're looking for a really crispy wing, then this may disappoint. But if you're looking for flavor they knock it out of the park. I have enjoyed pretty much everything I have ever ordered here. They also have good drink specials. And crushed ice!  My Staple: I usually get the buffalo chicken sandwich with the blazing sauce. It comes on a plain bun with shredded lettuce and tomato with ranch or bleu cheese on the side. (I go sans tomato)  It comes with seasoned crinkle cut fries.   Atmosphere: There are probably about 20 tables in this place so it can tend to be pretty packed if it's after work or there's a big game on TV. Decoration is pretty basic. The TV is usually tuned to sports and they have the NFL Sunday Ticket. When the games are on there is usually some fun banter between fans of opposing teams.  Service: The service isn't the speediest when busy but they are friendly and very accommodating.   Overall: A nice laid back place to grab a drink, catch a game and munch on some wings.

lIky704VvMwW7f6YO9yZdQ.text: All of their wings are very good but my favorite are the honey hots.... BEST EVER! Great hole in the wall place to grab a  beer and wings. Great service and the food is always hot and fresh. The place is hidden but I am glad I found it. You will not be disappointed.

bOkfEuxyY2YvYC3nXbmhCg.text: By far my favorite wing place. Don't let the strip mall exterior turn you off. This place has amazing wings at a decent price. Try the Hoisin Honey, my personal favorite!

jGw6h-bMkve31BrjNedCDQ.text: Small wing joint hidden away in an older strip mall- but the food is great! Very popular with the football crowd and can get crowded on game nights. Lots of tvs and good viewing angles if you're there to watch. Service is quick and attentive and the wings cant be beat. I'm particularly a fan of the sampler platter (25 wings) as we like to mix and match flavors. I almost feel bad for not giving them the full 5-stars, but I have to knock one off for ambiance, as the place tends to be a little dingy and loud.

M2sSZuEvYq_raTaMsz7A6g.text: After reading all of the great reviews, I decided to get a good amount of wings from d.d. Peckers for my friends and I. And I totally regret doing so. I ordered a variety of Blazing, Caribbean jerk, Hawaiian, and Teriyaki. ALL of the wings were burnt. The Blazing and Caribbean Jerk were edible, however I HAD to get my money back for the Hawaiian and Teriyaki. We only tried a couple pieces of which were totally flavorless and tasted like flavorless char. While getting my money back we were given a slight attitude and agreement that the wings were "overcooked". Overcooked is an understatement - every other piece was COMPLETELY black and totally inedible. I don't know what was wrong today versus the other days when these great reviews were submitted. I will not be going back and will tell everyone I know to stay away. Oh and in addition to this, the Blazing wings are also horrible. Their idea of making wings hotter is adding a huge amount of black pepper to the wings. Why not just add more red pepper to the buffalo sauce? It's beyond me.

fKAIfOeONat9r7gXXrPbww.text: I ordered lemon pepper wings but I swear that's not what I got. It was late and I was in the mood for some wings so of course I got on yelp, and this is one of the first places that came up so I gave it a try. It was my first time there so I was already nervous. I looked at the wings when she gave them to me but it was dark b/c the place is more of a hang out at night so I couldn't really tell if they were what I ordered or not but it did smell good. So I get home and I'm eating them and I'm enjoying them but then I realize it was not what I ordered. Lol. By then it was too late cuz I had already eaten half. And I still dunno what kind of wings they were which sucks b/c I liked them and now I can't order them next time. Lol

EExPe-BnOdu8V4iwhiJuEg.text: We came here while searching for the "best wings in Charlotte." I had high expectations for d.d.'s after reading these yelp reviews. It is not easy to find if you don't know what you are looking for. Once we got there, we decided to go with the wings platter. One or two of the wings were decent, the rest were forgettable. Perhaps if I hadn't read reviews and came in expecting mind-blowing wings, I wouldn't be so hard on them. It wasn't a waste of money, but our search for great wings in Charlotte continues.

g-jNJUl-nBHH_Qeea-xN-w.text: This place is definitely a dive but I can't say its not delicious. The wings aren't as scrawny as most places I go to;they are actually good meaty wings.The hot garlic is probably my favorite sauce because I can't get it anywhere else. The fried zucchini is also awesome. Service and food is great but the atmosphere could use some work.

coFjUcQ_z84LO77CR_n5Fg.text: THE BEST WINGS IN CHARLOTTE!  Hands down - was there yesterday and ordered 15 wings with 'hot gold' sauce made extra crispy.  The wings were a great size and the blue dipping sauce was great.  Tons of celery came with the wings.  They serve krinkle-cut fries here covered with a spicy salt - delish.  Just wish this place was closer to uptown.

TM6uLb8ib9wat08uPR1j5g.text: try the gold wings super bomb! wings are huge!

CVAkMKf6KSCi1eUhMIc-Yw.text: Pretty decent wings for the price. Tons of flavors to choose from. The staff is ok when it comes to politeness, but in the long run the wings and the beer specials make it worth it.

wBHFdWHKVI-aKyu588--9g.text: Best wings ever.  Just fantastic.  You may think twice about walking in, but will be glad that you did.  Found a great combination here, parm-garlic with a side of mild sauce is a flavor I can't do without when I go here.  Something on the menu for everyone.  Ample portions, excellent servers!  Do it!

toESfZ_cHwugD7H2Okz-Mw.text: YUM! Delicious wings, entertaining trivia host, great prices, super service and fun customers. I used to live around the corner and went here way more often, but even now that I've moved to the clear opposite side of town I still make the trek to visit once and a while.   The location may seem a bit odd at first, it's a strip mall hole-in-the-wall type bar with about 10 four top/3 high top tables and a bar that seats 8 or so, but if you're craving the best bar food THIS. IS. THE. PLACE!  *Favorite thing: Hot Garlic wings dipped in Ranch...or their cafeteria style krinkle cut fries, or their spicy fried pickles. Yeah, it's really just too hard to choose!

1Qje-0VO31cxWGC4uGByIg.text: Being advertised as a wing place, i got the teryakki wings and they were very salty and not that good i would say.  The 3 stars are for the BBQ Bacon cheeseburger, very good beef and tastes good.

gPYhHsLca_NRe7p7z1QMoA.text: Ordered carryout tonight and was pleasantly surprised. The buffalo shrimp app was really good but was a very small portion for $8. My husband and I split the shrimp po boy and it was huge so I'm glad we got one to share. We ordered the 25 wings with 5 sauces and could barely make a dent in them but the ones we did try were really good and had a lot of meat and sauce on each one. For this area wing joints are pretty slim and I would definitely go here over driving to BWW anytime!

OPVyYxBIBUw6rKdD_aP7Ng.text: DD peckers had always been known for their wings. Their beer selection is lacking for sure. Also we waited 40 minutes for wings on a slower night. The wings tasted great and were fresh, but they charge way too much for wings when they aren't really that much better than any other wing joint in the area. I won't be going back any time soon other than for a beer.

X0LN5MvckESN_cRYtbPQnA.text: Awesome wings and very friendly bartender. Wings and sauces are home made. If I'm ever back in the area I'll definitely be back at this place.

WnrK19zBdW3ATWRc9RjYMA.text: So now I'm hooked on the lemon pepper wings. Hot gold are still the staple for my husband, so I always steal a few of his too;) this place never disappoints. I hear the Panthers players love it too. I'm always up for a NFL player sighting!

rO7FxUCpmw2Y8UzZnO707Q.text: Great hole in the wall chicken wing joint. Large variety of flavors - will need many more visits before I've tried a majority of them. An OK beer selection, and flat screens abound for watching sports.

dVa7O-qlSKuLI6B9t_yD_w.text: Food is great, too bad I can't say the same of the employees. Poor customer service!!! Waitress dropped menu on the table. Yes, dropped it didn't fall. Also, gave us someone else's ranch with our order and didn't even apologize. Once you arrive they don't greet you , so sit where ever you would like. Horrible.

il2dWJT_N8Hc24xLW-rpbg.text: They have some of the best wings in Charlotte. It's a little hard to spot so keep your eyes open. But it is definitely worth checking out.

pKmxHFgZVy60INeb6UsCqQ.text: I live right across the street and have ordered take out from here a few times. The food is excellent! Every time my order has been correct and delicious. However, the staff has never been very friendly, especially on the phone. They've never been rude, just not as friendly as you expect in the hospitality business. That being said, I will definitely continue to order take out!

g31-X7yvaBTQnTo68hmp0w.text: Little bar with 1 server handling all tables. She does an amazing job though, service was excellent: fast and friendly. But wings are what this place is about, and they do them quite well. Some of the best I've ever had with many options. There is a nice selection of flavors, you can get them regrilled, and the fries and sides are good. The celery was tasty but the ranch and blue cheese are a bit bland. The wings are the perfect size, not huge but a bit bigger than most places. The meat seems like a higher quality than most wings I've had. You can get many flavors by ordering 5 wings at a time: you don't pay more for the smaller quantities. I tried 3 flavors with 1 regrilled and they were all great.

VMiEG9k5UKSISrzH7CoscA.text: Absolutely some of the best wangs I have ever put in my mouth. Great hole in the wall!

905uNuq7JBKi44hw0j4I7A.text: Horrible horrible experience and food!!  I Had a craving for some good ole fashion hot spicy wings. Googled the best hot wings near me.....this restaurant was listed in the top 5. How and why I don't understand.  Pulling into the parking lot was a surprise, wasn't at all what was expected to be listed in the top 5 best wings. Plastic silverware, drink was mediocre, server failed to tell us the wings were grilled, another surprise when our food arrived.  Bite into the wings barely warm didn't taste any flavor (order a hot spicy with a sweet twist, no flavor at all.  When server arrived asking how everything was, I had to tell her, she graciously said she would take them back and place them on the grill to warm them.  Plastic bowl returned, wings were in the exact placement when she took the bowl.  The kitchen heated the plastic bowl with celery between the wings in the MICROWAVE!!!!  Needless to say at this point I was so disappointed and ready to go.   How and why this is a restaurant in the top 5 needs to be re-evaluated and removed off the list!!!!!!

Qra_uxm4LYKpoxS7pWq0eg.text: I was very disappointed tonight with my hot teriyaki wings. They were burned and had no flavor. I should have went with the hot gold, but I was in a different mood tonight. I am a huge wing fan afficianado, because its in the flavor. I am still hooked on Louisiana Lickers from Quaker Steak & Lube (there's 1 in Pineville now. Also Whooli's is a close 2nd with their Whooli's sauce. But since it was my 1st time tonight I will give it one more shot. :)

Rm8RFQS_T5sVOEV0yR4Low.text: Extremely decent wing-noms, and great prices. I'd had D.D's before on take-out, but was reminded of it when we needed a place to have a continuous stream of food and alcohol while watching the first U.S. World Cup game. D.D. Pecker's it was.   Service this time around was a very helpful, bouncy, sweet girl who obviously knew nothing about soccer, but would cheer and boo when the crowd did anyway, and do so while still being attentive. Definite top rating for service. The drinks were strong, which was great. Also, they held no qualms with experimenting to make my favorite drink (Grateful Dead).   The wings, as always, were delicious. I can't handle hot too well, but the Cajun is still flavorful, and I'm a fan of the Gold. My new favorite and new experience was the Hoisin Honey, which was amazing. Crunchy, blackened, and flavorful on the outside, moist and sweet/nutty tasting on the inside. If you've been on the fence about them, trust me when I say that while they're not your traditional wing flavor, they are yum.   We also ordered some onion rings, which were good, but unfortunately we had to leave the bottom layer since there was a large puddle of fry grease floating there.   Great place to watch the game, and has a great atmosphere. Yeah, perhaps a dive, but for those of you out there who are dive-lovers, this place is clean, friendly, and has great food and good drinks while you watch the game. Pull up a stool.

tDaspH3NT-TrH6ucfuw6YA.text: Holy amazing wings! This is like s little hole in the wall but the best wings. For lunch usually there is a wait and there is literally one waitress working her butt off and you always have the best service! Would highly recommend this place for wings!

0J8xPBsX0LaOshVET_SQ2w.text: I can't believe this place got 4 stars overall!  Maybe the stars just weren't aligned when I went.  My night started with me wanting to find a good wings place nearby that was open past 10 PM. I was also interested in my church buddys coming here on Tuesday nights when they have .59 wings because we were looking for a closer place to South Charlotte.  DDs was nearby and open, so I thought I'd check it out due to the great reviews.  I walked in and no server said a word to me.  It was pretty busy, so, I sat myself.   No biggie.  After five minutes of no one saying anything, I moved to the bar since there was someone working that area.  Again, no one said anything to me for about 5 minutes.  I finally got a hello and ordered a drink.  After this, I waited 15 minutes for the bartender to take my food order despite the fact that my menu was closed and she passed by many times.  Finally, she took my order, and after bringing it to me, I didn't hear a peep for almost an hour when I finally had to ask for my check to leave.  No refills, no "how is everything."  I can't say I've EVERY experienced that at any restaurant no matter how busy.  To top it all off, the guy announcing trivia swore like a pirate including calling some girls "b*tches" which apparently they didn't find offensive.  I find it ironic they would have a sign out front that says "A Fun Neighborhood Joint."  I guess the name of the business should have given it away.  It sounds like a male strip club or something!  Oh and I would rate the sandwich a 4 out of 10.  Nothing special.  Never again will I return...

Ririp1R6h3mSyUApXXmH9w.text: Best wings the wife and I have had in quite awhile. Staff was friendly and efficient.

VNWAf1zdVSxtLP27R26xog.text: Tender and juicy hot wings. The chili cheese fries are huge and delicious! This place looks a little scary from the outside. It is clean and the waitress was friendly. The wings and homemade ranch are fantastic.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

4rXjMGXifOq-2svEVDk7Ig.text: This is one of the best places to get wings in Charlotte. I've been wanting to check it out for a while now, but just now got around to it. Wing King Cafe is also frequently mentioned as the best wings in Charlotte. It's hard for me to say which is better since it's been a few years since I've been to Wing King Cafe, but both have amazing wings.   We got the 25 wing sampler with Ginger, Hot Gold, Hot Ranch, Hot Fajita, Garlic Parmesan. All of the flavors were really good and the hot flavors weren't too spicy (to someone who doesn't like really spicy food). The Hot Fajita was definitely the hottest, but was still good to me. It had a strong lime flavor and was my husband's favorite (he loves spicy food). We both agreed the Ginger was the weakest of the flavors we got - it had a teriyaki/ginger seasoning, but didn't have much flavor at all. The charred flavor was good, but I was hoping for a much stronger ginger flavor. The Hot Ranch was a Buffalo Ranch and was pretty good. The Hot Gold was a mustard BBQ with a little kick and the Garlic Parmesan was pretty solid. Overall, there's a ton of options to choose from and I would expect everyone to be able to find something they like.   The service is incredibly fast and friendly. They were happy to provide explanations and recommendations.   We will definitely be coming back next time we want some wings!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

jtQIeoDxCqiNM7HGZ-GfjA.text: I've always really liked DD Peckers and we've been going there since I was young. The other day I went and it was a lil disappointing.... the menu doesn't have a lot on it for anyone not wanting wings, like my bf, years ago there was much more that they did. I love their wings and I love the BC dressing, but .95 cents for a BC is crazy.  My boyfriend order the bacon cheeseburger and they forgot the bacon... so sitting there waiting for his bacon... him telling me to eat my wings so they don't get cold, and his is sitting getting cold. How do u mess up a bacon cheeseburger! Especially since we were the only table in the place and it was right after they opened.... I thought the girl would take off the bacon at least since we had to wait too long for it, and shouldn't have had to at all...... I asked for 2 BCs to go that she brought out and sat down and said there 95 cents each so I said no, she said she'd do 2 for $1, but after her messing up the burger or the kitchen, I would expected her to give them to us considering....  we won't return.  There's wild wing downtown and at arsley, and wing king is on south Tryon and is amazing and been there forever! There are so many wing places out there, this place should go the extra mile, not upcharge so bad, and be consistent making sure everything comes out of the kitchen correctly!!!!! There's no harm in waiting longer for things to come out so they come out correctly and hot.  Definitely was a disappointment to show my BF this place I've loved as a child that looks like it's going down the tubes.... literally we were the only table, and got there at 11:05am and they open at 11.   No excuses!!! Did nothing to assure that we would come back either.

oeq7irnLmt0KN9OA1BSC5w.text: I absolutely love their Cajun dry rubbed wings!  Their dipping sauces are great as well. I'm not the keto diet as it's one of my guilty pleasures.  Wings were good this time around but seemed smaller than what I've had in the past. I went at lunch tomw with a friend and it was very busy. We weren't in a rush but it took them about 20 mins to get us our wings and chicken on a stick.   I will be grabbing another order today (to go). I hope I get some juicy big and tasty wings.

80MDeuPZYkL0sIvh2XCa4g.text: I have lived in Charlotte my entire life so I have a fond place in my heart for DD peckers. They have pretty much every flavor under the sun and the crisp and crunch of their wings is unforgettable.   The location is a hole in the wall in a shopping center but the unremarkable exterior is made up for by the great flavor of their wings! I usually get take out here, but plenty of people eat in the restaurant.

vmd0n0G4QnoTPvew3VgGrQ.text: Hours say "11-midnight" showed up at 10:45pm to only be told "sorry we're closed" when we walked into the restaurant.

poy8SOL_J8xwsHBV-s-xYA.text: This place! I like it!  Came here with coworkers while on a work trip. When I saw the shopping center where this place was I was like "really"??? Boy was I in for a shock.  The place is small and if you're not paying attention you may pass but the wings are great! They come in all flavors and are plentiful.   We had some mild ones, sweet ones, and hot ones. They came out fresh and quickly by a very good and friendly wait staff.  When we left we were stuffed.  Also the bar had all types of beers for my coworkers.  More importantly the price was great... we had 25, beer, fries, liquor, and onion rings all for under $60. That alone will make me come back.

S9lVoA9Uqa1-0C8qub5vAg.text: So I'll give it 5 stars based on the reviews , the line at the door, the tables all full and the to go line picking up orders...   Its a small little sports bar atmosphere - There's TVs on every wall .  Tucked in a little strip mall in Pineville.... it's a hidden gem ! Parking is tight and you may have to walk a bit to get to the place from the parking lot ... as the place apparently keeps the parking lot packed!   On to the food...  My order of 10 wings came out record fast ... within 10 minutes ! Not sure if it was the kitchen was ready for the football crowd or what but it was fast !   I tried 2 flavors, mild and Gold wings based on the recommendation of the waitress.  The wings were off the hook delicious!   Tender and flavorful- I have to say the honey were so good and the mild had just enough kick to cause my lips to tingle but not so hot that I ran for water.  Both were Just delicious! Both sets of 5 were very wet . Covered in sauce - so be prepared to use a roll of paper towels...    So if you're looking for good wings .., There here for sure !  Two thumbs way up !

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. These wings were delicious! Gold and Mild !

D94qbit_j3_v5t2KSTefnA.text: DD Peckers was amazing! The wings were excellent. Our favorite flavors were the hot ranch and the hot gold.

zP6KsX9OzRpEua6UYPjs0g.text: Best wings in clt hands down. I can never fathom how some come here and order something besides the wings but they all claim the food is good as well. Hot ranch and hot gold are absolutely amazing and never disappoint. Also the house made chips are tasty. Anyways this is my favorite spot in clt and I come here regularly.

5jViL4epP7Y2CIgwGocruw.text: Stopped in around lunch time today during football Sunday. Found them because my friend and I were in the area and looking for a new place to grab something to eat. Giving them 4 stars only because the service was great considering it was only two ladies working the floor and bar area on football Sunday. The wings are not the best in Charlotte but they were pretty good. I would caution lemon pepper lovers, as they are not a dry rub like most. They are drenched in teriyaki so you taste mainly that flavor. The menu does not mention that so I suggest they add that as a notation to the menu. Also, the side salad was $3.95, probably should be $2.50 considering how small the salad was. Overall pretty good with great service.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

xPbtT7QuRA6AQXNtOD68Lw.text: Honey hot wings and fried pickles were both 5/5.  One waitress handled the entire place for lunch like a pro.  Always come here when in town.  Always a great stop!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

MxtLA08odpqykX2obFT6Jw.text: The tender combo was great however the customer service needs much more work. We sat and observed both waitresses who were serving us. They engaged on multiple occasions with all of the customers asking how the food was and what they needed minus us. The only time was when we stopped to ask for a refill. Then normally after one is finished, a server will ask if we are ready or bring the bill & told to take our time with paying. However on this occasion the server came over to bring our bill that had additional charges for food not ordered and walks away.

HPzOQ0SMXiw_yuKZQ4YGNg.text: The Philly cheesesteak was ok at best.  Not the best not the worst. Meat is bland. The fried pickles are disgusting. Way over cooked and burnt. Makes me think anything fried isn't gonna be good.  Don't waste your time.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

JWAPAjJhNn0oDR8-mg8D3g.text: I decided to give 'em a whirl after hearing about them for the past couple years.  Straight up dive located in a non-descript strip mall like others mention.  The staff was friendly, service was quick, and the prices decent.  I only ordered wings to go:  Honey Gold (too sweet for my liking) and Cajun spice (which is better when dipped in the Honey Gold sauce).  I appreciate that the wings were sized properly--not some wimpy pigeon wings, nor the pumped full of factory steroids size, either.  About what a normal chicken grows when its raised for consumption by regular folk.  Would I return?  Yes, if I lived nearby.  With so many decent wing places nearer my neighborhood, however, its probably a one-off for me.  PS:  The Ron Jeremy pic behind the bar is too funny!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

o51Vt0N-tnctVI8f-fZJ8w.text: Wings were good. The southern wings are highly recommend, request them to be tossed in hot. Blue cheese is good and chunky

8wfYWmodOe5QvUlFYD5YJA.text: umm, disgusting. the pictures should speak for themselves. the"garlic parmesan" wings were SO oily and disgusting. the hot honey BBQ had a somewhat decent flavor (but again still VERY oily) and they gave me one that was barely the size of my pinky that was basically all cartilage. I am in SHOCK someone would call these the best wings in Charlotte. save your money and go somewhere else.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. garlic parmesan wings......
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. this wing was all cartilage.
