vUDWGCIcSpn-XQdZ61SviA.text: Best darn wings in Charlotte.   Staff is great too.  Place is very laid back, the food is great and comes quickly, and is very reasonably priced.   The bar is well stocked with a good selection and they have several IPA'S on draft.  All in all 5 stars in my book

RVZ_joRjjzO3w0PSCY8eDA.text: (6/10/18) My wife found this place while taking an employee to lunch. It seems that its a good restaurant for wings without the crass commercialism of the chain wing places. Any place that has hard cider delivered by waitresses in tank top is a plus in my book. The chicken was nice and moist and the atmosphere was homey. We'll definitely be back.

CBF-k25WYXYYmZa1Cgyh5w.text: Not a bad place. The wings were great and the fries were good as well. The draft beer list is small. The service was good.

Gy99AwzLEYEcGNggI2eh2w.text: Best wings in Charlotte.  Period.  Flavors are great and they will cook them to your liking.

45GFYLH0mJBXungc4D0r6A.text: BEST WINGS & NACHOS IN CHARLOTTE!!!! They also have the best blue cheese dressing to dip the wings in. So So Good!!! My favorite wing flavors are Garlic Parmesan & BBQ!! I regret I never tried DD PECKERS sooner than we did but this is now our go to place for wings & nachos!!

EQpqlctkCTbjlXZW1st4WQ.text: Great ranch, good wings.  Not five star because last time I got to go there was a hair in my food.

l-NenvdQDeqoePprPxZroQ.text: Yeah, real good wings ! Went here recently with my son after reading  reviews on Yelp. This place is definitely a hole in the wall dive, which is fine by me . We ordered the fried pickle spears and house made chips as an appetizer, which were both good, not great. The wings were what we came for ,and we were not to be disappointed. Got 3 different flavors of wings. Mild are like a traditional Buffalo wing, hot ranch and hot honey BBQ. The hot ranch was outstanding, a crunchy, spicy, ranch flavor, really good! The mild wing was also excellent. The hot honey BBQ was good, not great.  Definitely coming back again and would recommend this place to any wing lover.

mZU3GK80wKQRJwo-0zzy6A.text: Best wings...loved their hot teryaki!  Small place and looks rough on the outside but inside was clean and service was good/friendly.  Lots of tvs and it was a comfortable environment.  Tried 5 different types of wings and all were excellent.  The chili cheese fries were good too.  All in all it was affordable good food.

yENNne8UbF4vRppbVeFWgA.text: So, this place is a dumpy neighborhood bar located in a not-so great strip mall basically in an alley. For some reason, people bring their kids to this place even though it's a bar so it's usually really noisy. The food is actually really good. The wings are delicious and flavorful as are the buffalo chicken wraps and the onion rings. They are crispy, battered and greasy just like onion rings should be. Their ranch tastes homemade and is very good. Note that this is the kind of place where the bartenders/waitresses know most folks and when we were there, we happened to be sitting in someone's "regular" booth and the group of dads were playing fantasy football with their kids (???) so we felt the need to split so the gang could sit together. So, it is a neighborhood dive bar, lots of noisy kids, good food. Service is okay at best.

wv_XQJ-SUIxsRgNNSeRonw.text: This place was amazing. It has the feel of a small hole in the wall restaurant. We had the onion rings which are a must and french fries for a starter. And wings as a main course which were bomb. I will return.

CWiVRcKQJ2P5e08zGpGcxQ.text: If I want great wings I go to DD's.  You can't go wrong with anything on their menu.  You need to try their Hot Ranch.  I'm addicted to this place.  Can't wait go back.

Im02ZqGzRTiVLLu8kaVFtA.text: Great homemade blue cheese.. Great "hot" wings.. Great spicy onion rings, not heavily breaded and seasoned well!  Staff was quick, efficient and friendly

fKXg-n0EAOgMqzjBl_CDyA.text: My friends took me there telling me they have the best wings in Charlotte at the best prices. Well, they were good, and not skimpy on size. The service was good enough and the waitress knew the menu. This place isnt anything to rave about though. If I lived on that street I would go back.

oTbXG-AbIoYGSg950EV6Yg.text: Oh man oh man oh man. If you know ANYTHING about wings, and you live in Charlotte, then you ABSOLUTELY POSITIVELY MUST know about D.D. Peckers, and if you don't, then you will quickly learn the value of such a wonderful place.   This hole in the wall is a welcoming sort of place, despite it's surroundings. And by welcoming, I mean, roll-your-sleeves-up-grab-a-cold-one kind of welcoming. It is a hive for sports fans, trivia nerds, and wing aficionados alike.   Three flavors to go for- Blazing (if you are a spice fanatic), hot gold, and honey hot. It is so awesome to eat a non-Texas Pete soaked wing in a world full of them. They obviously make their own buffalo sauce, or if they don't, they stole nectar from the gods. Bangin' and I mean BANGIN flavors.  Ordered a side of fries, which were crispy and seasoned. Blue cheese is made in house, and it's thick and chunky and wonderful...also a hard feat to come by.   Just simply do yourself a favor and go. Don't dress up, don't use a fork and knife, you will get strange looks from people like me if you do! ;-)

2vmqilRdST06CGp5e30cZQ.text: Excellent wings.  We like the hot ranch variety but they are all good.  The wait staff is fast and nice.  They explain all the options. Get a basket of the home made potato chips! Yummmm...

9sE9yHfykxxDKsiWitEXEw.text: I really hope these aren't "Charlotte's best" wings. After all the positive reviews, it seemed like the place to go for wings, but I was highly disappointed. We ordered a 25 wing sampler, and the Hawaiian and Hoisin can only be described as bad. The Hot and BBQ were average at best. Definitely not good enough to warrant a return trip.

_CPp71SlAcRrP6p5mjghIw.text: We stopped here while in Charlotte after finding decent reviews for this place on Yelp.  I LOVE wings, and am always excited to try new places, especially one that offers so many flavors.  We ordered the 25 sampler wings, consisting of Mild, Hot Garlic, Hot BBQ, Cajun and Hot Gold. Somehow I didn't get the Hot Garlic and ended up with more Hot Gold. The Cajun was a dry rub and I liked it. The Hot Gold was a southern style BBQ which I didn't really care for. If you like BBQ sauce on your wings, try it. I don't....     My daughter got the Hot Garlic and she said they were okay. It looked like they dumped way too much actual minced garlic on top of them.  My daughter had the lemonade. She said she doesn't know what sewer water tastes like, but she was pretty sure this was it. The sodas were very seltzery.  Service was a little slow, but it was Saturday during dinner, and it was packed.  We all ended up with stomach pains that night, especially my wife who was up all night. I thought it to be a fluke, until I read other reviews below mentioning stomach pain.  I'm not sure if it was too much seltzer from the sodas or what, but it was enough that my wife won't let us go back.  I don't like judging places on one visit, and with the crowds, I'm assuming people getting sick isn't the norm. Give it a try. The wings are huge and if you live locally, I'm sure you'll end up finding your favorite sauce.  Good Luck!

_YNwNZkzly2vr7lhLQtFyg.text: Off the hook wings!!!! Don't be scared... Order the sampler (25 wings) and get 5 different flavor a. ( there are 26 to choose from!) service is FAST and great!!! #thisplacerocks!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

8vw2eZReJuqdsaUcXZXv8Q.text: This place had the best wings I used to order them at least twice a week!! But I ordered from them yesterday and it just wasn't up to par. I was so disappointed in them. I was looking forward to their wings smh. I'll give them another try in the later future

07jF1xhB83JxQs5YaFuUBw.text: Absolute best wings in Charlotte!! My favorites are the hot honey BBQ and hot gold. I usually just do take out, but the staff is always friendly.

xbTDtqbo8MPvc2JazgoW9g.text: The wings are very good for a great price.  I love the honey hot, better then most wing spots.

jSCPfgXN_19XNonoC0VfDw.text: I work not too far from this establishment and the first place one of my new coworkers brought me (to welcome me to the family) was DD Peckers.  He goes to this place for lunch AT LEAST every other week, and he brings a car full of colleagues every time.  I like the wings a lot and I'm setting up an online order now to do a pickup for dinner.

3luJf4nEo03djOOXHhByqg.text: Great wing joint. I went there with my Migos for lunch. We were all impressed with the food and attentive, friendly staff.  We're definitely adding it to the rotation.

iguT4LLPMqYxc0XnVWopbw.text: Horrible wings!  We tried the Hoisin Honey wings....HORRIBLE....the garlic parm wings....okay, and lemon pepper...less than average!  However, the onion rings were good.  Not sure what the hype is all about, but after eating the wings, both myself and my husband had tummy and headaches!  Will NOT be returning......EVER!

OS8CiD-MAoQ5u9YXIHRfIg.text: I've heard about these good wings in Charlotte so of course I had to go try it. DD Peckers has over 25 flavors to choose from and pride themselves on being the best wings in Charlotte. . . Pictured:  Pineapple wings, hot wings and honey bbq! We wanted to try different flavors to see what the craze was all about. Turned out they were all incredible! My personal fav that we tried was the hot flavor, these were perfectly cooked and just exploded with flavor.  . . We had a side of some delicious chili fries which was packed with melted cheese, it was a great partner for this combo. If you are out in the area I highly recommend this place and the wings especially. Very cool place with a nice laid back vibe, service was on point which was great!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bar area
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chili cheese fries

RvwUMQtlFOOY3wLPILD4mA.text: Wings are not the best Charlotte has to offer, neither is service. There was 1 waitress on a Friday night, who was super "rushy" with us and took about 6-7 mins in between each visit coming to our table. When she came over, she instantly pushed the roll of napkins, salt and pepper shaker to the middle of the table so she could put down her paper to take out order, knocking over the pepper shaker. Once she noticed pepper spilled all over the table, she wiped it off, onto my friends lap that had on white pants, and blamed my other friend for knocking it over smh. It took her about 2 times coming over before we placed drink orders 3 more times coming over before taking our actual food order, again, too rushy and a lack of patience.   Once our food came out, which didn't take long, all of us ordered extra crispy wings, and none were crispy. I had 1-2 out of 10 that were crispy, and when she came around to see how things were, we'd literally just began eating. After about 10mins, my friend just gave up and was tired of picking over her wings, trying to find one that was right. I was ok with mine, and stated I'd just put the remaining ones in the oven later. When we notified the waitress, my friend had 15 and again, all were soft and flimsy. The waitress asked her what she wanted to do about it, my friend asked could they make the remaining over. She said "well you've ate about all of them, so we can just make them over, Ive been over here a couple of times so you should have been said something..." so my friend went said well you asked what I wanted done. Then the waitress proceeded to say "I've been here/serving for 18 yrs and you have to speak up when something is wrong" So we are like "ok we had to eat a few to know they were not cooked to our desired liking...as we'd asked!!!! She kept going on and on, so my friend just sat their and got quiet. Then my friend said "you know what, I don't want them remade, it's ok. So the waitress THEN assumed and said "you want me to pay huh, I'll just pay for it" and then she looked at me and said "who else wants their meal paid for tonight???" TOTALLY rude and almost discriminatory. So I said well do you want to pay because you can!!!! She said well no, and She just ended up walking to another table, and it appeared she was talking to them about the situation. It took her about 15 mins to even come back over, for us to ask for our check and boxes. We paid and she tried to reexplain herself for earlier, saying if there is a problem just say something early on. My friend told her she was just trying to give them an actual chance before complaining. She only charged two of us. We gave her our payments and whoever is responsible for cashing out, actually ran my card twice for myself and the other guest tab! Our waitress was then super frustrated started to get teary eyed and I just told her it was fine, I could get the cash back from the other person. She did at least try to fix that and was apologetic. Needless to say, we still left a good tip and just left. I'm sure I'll never return!

JuYEXqXA1R2BxvVbMHdPIw.text: I was in the mood for a Philly cheesesteak.  This joint has good wings so I thought I'd give it a try.   Big mistake. The worst excuse for a cheesesteak .... the roll had no flavor. It was just plain white bread. The sandwich needed twice the amount of meat and the mushrooms were rubbery.   Stick to the wings is my advice.

ZpmVxkLirTxQGehCRop2QQ.text: Theresa was absolutely amazing! She shared her opinions on the menu and how right she was!! Wonderful food we must return!!! Like tomorrow!! No joke! The burgers were stupendous! N fries and even the pickles!! Hubby loved his Megaburger!!!! N chips were delishhhh! People Come and get it! You won't regret it!! I promise!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Yes!!! He loved it! He really really L O V E D it!!!
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Burger?! What burger?? Wow! Now that&#39;s a burger n fries!! What about hubby? I think he Loved it!!! Look at his smile!

SPmADbiUTiGfD7RJS_77pQ.text: I have been wanting to try this place forever, since they are always listed in the Best Wings of CLT category...........Clearly I am in the minority, with a really REALLY bad visit.   Saturday at 2:30 pm, the place was full, standing room only.   We got a table after 15 mins or so.    Off the bat, dirty table, no hand soap in either restroom, men's bathroom was filthy - as in a whole number level of nastiness.  I get it, it was slammed, the gals working were hustling and I take nothing away from the service, it was awesome.    The problem was, myself, my wife and I all had bad stomach cramps and diarrhea, its 24 hours later and we still do not feel normal.   We ordered 25 wing combo with Cajun, Blazing, Mild, Teriyaki and Honey Hoisin.  For those of you that like large meaty wings, this place is not for you.   All wings were on the small to medium size, which I prefer.   The Cajun were decent, the Blazing had zero heat - in fact, we cold not figure out which is brazing and which is mild, the Teriyaki had zero flavor - almost like the Teriyaki sauce ran off on the platter,  SURPRISE - the burnt looking honey hoisin were pretty damn tasty.   They are not burnt, they just look burnt.    We ordered onion rings.  They were excellent.   The fried mushrooms were terrible,  over-breaded and way over-cooked.   My wife ordered the buffalo chicken sandwich which she said was nothing special.  As a family we shared the onion rings and mushrooms, something must have been going on.  I am not sure what the issue was.   Obviously, based on the Yelp love and excellent reviews, we clearly had an "aw shit" experience, we get it, it happens, but it does totally suck.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Clockwise left to right, Hoisin, Teriyaki, Blazing, Mild, Cajun.

11Q8Nu3B68J_O87lkStq1g.text: Wings are as good as any in Charlotte.  It's a dive bar in a strip shopping center, and service is super friendly.  I got a mix of hot Buffalo and gold medal sauces.  Took advantage of the all drums deal.  Not for the fufu B-dubs crowd, come grab a cod one and enjoy the legit wings.

G0nhDGM7JICFZW9zESF4jw.text: Eh, the first time I tried this place I had high expectations since I heard the wings were so good. My mom ordered the teriyaki wings and they came out so burnt and black they'd probably turn to dust if you poked them. Even the waitress couldn't believe they were brought to the table like that. I tried to give this place another try this week and ordered the chicken philly wrap...honestly it was pretty dry and I couldn't tell if I was actually eating chicken or not. Disappointing and probably won't be back. On a positive note, the homemade chips and the mozzarella sticks are pretty yummy. So it's a hit or miss with what you order.

QY9cnOm2YhtTwD6NPzoPFg.text: I've got to clarify that we've eaten at DDP's dozenS of times and had great food.   Today we got take out for the game. As we pulled up Yelp for the menu I noticed several lower ratings but dismissed it since we love the joint. We had a friend over from Buffalo we've told about DDP's so many times, and were mortified at the boxes we opened. The wings were comical Smurf size. The Hoisin looked like fossilized charcoal with sesame seeds. Of the 35 wings we ordered nearly half were borderline inedible. In fairness, the tenders were great as always.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

oCrd8Jx0VQhcZTOosU-yvQ.text: My boyfriend and I are visiting Charlotte and decided to try this place. I have to say this, the food wasn't too horrible however it wasn't that special. Also in their menu, it doesn't say onions come on the bbq bacon cheeseburger, I don't like onions and if I didn't see them or was allergic then it could have been an issue. Also we could have had more chicken in the wrap. Their bar seems pretty popular though

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Blackened chicken wrap
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. BBQ Bacon Cheeseburger

mVkDC9R0Uu8n1ITGgqUhTg.text: Without a doubt the best wings I've had in a while, will certainly come back. Enjoyed a variety of flavors from honey hot, garlic parm, Caribbean and Hoisin honey.  Fiesta feta dip is really good too. The only watch out is the dining area isn't huge, fills up quick. Be prepared for a wait to sit on weekends.

o60ZBAhM6vYdDZxT9c2GeA.text: I have ate here several times and chose this hole in the wall because of yelp reviews.   The wings are phenomenal and a good variety of flavors to choose from.  The prices for wings are very reasonable   I have not tried any of the appetizers or sandwiches and wraps but they look pretty good on others plates.   I am not local so when in the area I always go for the wings and am never disappointed.  Maybe next time i lately something else.

Xb88i5zPKVLtXyJ98k7HQw.text: We called in our order, and it was done quickly. Good burgers, the fries were a little cold and probably could've been cooked a little bit longer... But overall our food was good

j_xELXUUmTv-DWXXn2FgIw.text: heard great things about the wings, ordered 10 wings to go. Both the wing sauce and the dipping sauce were incorrect. Won't be back unfortunately.

gMHTGnv7--HbAoVtHB-YUw.text: We came here expecting the "best wings in Charlotte" and it just didn't live up to the title. We got lucky and a table opened up right after we arrived. Ordered a beer each and a cheese fry to begin. We only ordered the half and it was still a good size and we were pleasantly surprised to have real melted cheese on top (totally expected cheese sauce). I ordered 5 lemon pepper and 5 garlic parm. The hubby ordered 5 honey hot and 5 hot. He tried all 4 and the hot was his favorite. The lemon pepper was good but not a dry rub. The wings were medium- to medium small size. The garlic parm were super mediocre. They were wet and had Parmesan and minced garlic just dumped on them and didn't have any flavor. We're just team Lebowskis wings.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

BjOZPeKSCGHq2yKnJAYbVQ.text: Ok. So the wings were ok. They are bigger then most places and I asked for the. Extra crispy so they would be cooked thoroughly but that was not the case. I also only like hot buffalo style wings sauce , no fancy or strange flavors. There buffalo was hot but did not taste like buffalo. It had what seemed like black pepper flakes in it and maybe some tabasco not sure but it was just ok. I most likely won't be going back. Service was excellent and friendly and if ur lookin for big wings in untraditional flavors then I would check this place out!

WiycxeroBSHzgiW1c2dqUQ.text: Finally gave a try to the most popular "wings" in Charlotte. But seriously disappointed - the wings were completely dry as if they have been fried few times and the sauce wasn't coated over the wings.  Blazing wasn't hot and the hot gold had too much tartness.

7jU2R_5sD0WFAbuZ8jq6tw.text: The wings were pretty good. I had the smoked teriyaki wings and some fries. They are quite tasty. The service was a little bit questionable. They got the food to me fast and it was hot. The waitress could have been more polite. I definitely will come back because I can put up with a snarky waitress as long as I'm getting good wings.

Ut0z_hQmzgXnmzp1ZriS-A.text: A little dive place with beer and wings/ other bar foods, came around lunch time and didn't get welcomes or felt welcome at all. Should have a 2x ($) it's a little pricey for what they put out, first Impression was not expected since I've been scoping this place for a while now.  I got wings and beer. The wings were cooked fine but wow they need to work on sauces lol Caribbean was wayyy too salty, no sage or sweetness added, just repulsive. The hot garlic was a little better with fresh garlic bits but the hot sauce was thin and watered down. So it was basically plain fried chicken wings with bits of garlic pieces.  Very relaxed environment, I guess they don't have anything exciting or new going on there. I wish them good luck. My culinary degree and 10 years of restaurant experience says they need a little work in the kitchen. They might put some good stuff out sometimes but very inconsistent. Also 27 mins for wings is obsurd for that order. Especially with 4 tables lol the bartender did a great job with tending and waiting tables

eZnxmBuGi7l8HGc_5qCOlQ.text: I stayed in the area and came to DD Peckers based on the many 5 star reviews.  I struggled slightly to find it as it is in a small strip mall and behind a filling station.  I am thrilled I found it.  It did not disappoint!    I was greeted by the friendliest staff (Cynthia) with the sweetest down home personality in the south.    Peckers is a small joint but it has everything a sports fan would desire!   12 TV's, a full bar and the incredible wings I have had.  I ordered 12 Hot Gold and by the time I realized I should have taken a picture for this review, they were gone.   I ordered 5 more of the Hot Ranch! (See pic).   BOTH ARE AWESOME!  Bottom line, if you are anywhere close to DD Peckers, Charlotte, Pineville, heck anywhere near North or South Carolina, come get wing

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

mM41csZJunZMRk2WzVk4tQ.text: Best wings in Charlotte, hands down. Total hole in the wall - exactly how it should be. Wings are always served fresh and extremely hot. Ordering wings naked with sauce on the side makes for an even fresher wing with the perfect crisp. The only disappointment I have is that I wasted two years eating wings in Charlotte before finding DD's.

z6enZkAKXnV0jf-AAivkQQ.text: Went here for the first time during lunch.  There was a decent lunch crowd and the speed of service was average.  The place had 2 classic arcade games and several large HDTVs and probably would be great place to enjoy a sporting event.  It's a friendly little spot that offers a lot of different flavors of your favorite wings.  We tried the 5 flavor sampler and thought the Honey Hot and the Hot Gold flavors were the best. The others flavors were tasty, but slightly on the salty side.    They don't offer a special "wing night" like other similar establishments, but they appear to be doing fine without that type of promotion (although it would be nice if they did offer it).  Another thing they didn't offer were some wet naps!  Overall, it was a good experience and I would return just to try out their other flavors.

bjYYwxi5e9syFXpYAKbUXg.text: Meh.  I checked this place out after reading the rave reviews on yelp and was pretty disappointed.  The service wasn't very good.  When we walked in, it took a good few minutes before someone even acknowledged us and told us to sit anywhere.  My husband and I went for the wing platter where you can get five wing flavors of five wings each.  We went with what we heard was good including the Hot Gold.  I will admit the Hot Gold was pretty good, but everything else was just mediocre.  I don't know that I would necessarily go back here with other wing joints closer to where I live, but I suppose I'd give it another whirl if I happen to be in the neighborhood.  Nothing to go out of your way for in my opinion.

uaM3WCzkDhlDrQjcftCg_Q.text: Best wings ever... Try the hot gold delicious... The fried pickles and fried oysters aren't bad either....

AEW26Y9PwXbbUEq2nqlt9Q.text: Still a 5.  Went Friday night with friends for beers and wangs (we all had our usuals) and returned today with another friend and tried the fried pickles.  YUM!  Different.  Usually fried pickles are pickle chips, but DD's deep fries spears in a slightly spicy crunchy batter and is served with either ranch or hot ranch (I went with ranch as I had ordered some Honey Hot wings).  We went early and the football crowd started to roll in as we were set to leave.  Plenty of big TV's were rolling in preparation for the ball games  I love the wait staff who keeps your drinks filled and checks on you without hovering.  My absolute favorite local dive.

804apsjlaf2wbW1KHr_zBw.text: Spot-on wings for Charlotte.  I'm rarely on that side of town, but when I am I always try to stop through.  Ordered some take-out(but have eaten in many times) wings for watching football playoffs today.  Got hot-gold, every one of them.  Nice crunch, great flavor(mildly mustardy), with a good amount of heat.  The heat doesn't blow your doors off, sorry all you masochists out there.  Not extremely cheap, but you can't really find 25 cent wings anywhere anymore.  As far as the "restaurant" goes, its pretty much a dive bar in a strip mall.  Just telling it like it is.

KvHhelJLfqUbVvdtD-VS5A.text: We have been here few times and never in my life have I been in a place of business that blatantly targets a table of paying customers for their race and their heritage. A group of us sat, not bothering anyone, trying to have dinner, when we were attacked by the owner of the restaurant for being Asian. When we called him out on it, he just continued on. He even finished the night by saying " I will be here next week but that table won't be." What a terrible waste of space.

hsDbxarSsSGm7CIo_CYVtA.text: IMO these are the best wings in Charlotte and I have tried a bunch of places that claim to be great.  It's a hole in the wall in a strip mall but they know how to make some fine wings and that's why the place is always busy.  By far their best sauce is the Hot Gold.  Try your wings extra crispy with this warmy tangy sauce and some blu cheese to dip them in and you can't go wrong.  Very affordable as well.  A basket of seasoned fries will run you about $3 and their side salads are always fresh and tasty!    The wings are so good I almost hate to review this place as I don't want it to become too popular!  Do yourself and your taste buds a favor and stop in and try the Hot Gold.  The Hot Ranch isn't too shabby either!

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States

GtF3Wi0YbaCGyd2MnmJaZA.text: BEST WINGS EVER!!!  We eat here almost once a week and if we skip a couple weeks we make it up by going 4 days in a row. I love the hot honey bbq and the garlic, my bf usually gets the hot gold, but we've had almost all the flavors and you really can't go wrong. We've also ate our way through their appetizer list and can't complain about any of them, good and greasy and the prefect starter to the main meal. Surprisingly their Veggie burger is amazing, like one of the best I've ever had.  Their daily domestic drink specials are on point and great for washing down the wings. Buy one of their koozies and you'll be set!  All the ladies who work are are awesome. They each have their own thing going and bring something unique to their service. It's not fake sugar coated generic niceties and that's what makes them awesome. They're genuine and that's appreciated.   This place can get packed esp during Carolina games and it may not be the hippest, classiest or shinest place but it is hands down my favorite wings/grab some beers place to go in Charlotte.

Y1ztPO0pY1-00SjGccV8RQ.text: If you like dive bars, don't judge books by their  covers, don't mind a cold domestic beer, unpretentious waitstaff and really good wings, this my friend, is the place for you.  Come as you are, park in the raggedy parking lot. Tiny place that is well worn but clean.  Get a bottle of Miller Lite or Ultra and get some wings to share try the Gold, they are excellent.  I'm not saying this is the place to bring out of town friends but there is a reason this it has great reviews.  So the next time you don't feel like putting make up on or doing your hair, give this place a try.

MR0kxm3tSmMILOYVsCrGdw.text: Sold on the Gold - Hot Gold wings and the gold medal for the:   The Best wings in Charlotte...Best.  You don't have to ask for crispy they come out with the slight crisp and a solid amount of sauce.  Hot Gold - Best.  Drop the microphone.  I am here at 9:00 on a Friday and this place has been slammed for hours.  The difference maker vs. other solid wing places is that the staff and cooks have been here for years and years.  Great service too..

-iAEdnqI10C5jMt4_SIlng.text: Wow. DD Peckers is a little diamond tucked away between Park Rd and Hwy 51. Stuck between other small shops and pubs, you'll want to find your way in, sooner rather than later, to try out this pub grub.   The wings. Man. Just the plain old mild are where it's at. Big wings with tons of sauce. The Hot Gold are like Carolina Mustard BBQ meets awesome and had a lovechild. Delicious.   The cheese fries are a little lackluster. Great fries. Seasoned well and crinkle cut. The cheese is just shredded cheese thrown on top. Not my favorite but does well in a pinch.   The fried pickles are dank. Huge spears and generously breaded. Go for a little ranch or bleu dipping action and you're set.   The inside is so quaint. Easy to feel right at home at the bar, one of the high-tops or a booth. Sink into the culture a bit more and come in for trivia or watch the game. Great people run this place and the product and atmosphere shine that fact forth gloriously.   Thanks, DD Peckers. You've got my vote!

MS0kOXulTIGqCUW35J0DFg.text: Wings the way they were meant to be! We take out from here a couple of time a month or whenever I'm in the mood for some wings! It reminds of a lot of the places I would go for wings back in WNY. My order is always ready when I arrive (about 15min) no matter how busy they are.   I usually order the traditional hot wings. These pack a little heat behind them! Recently, upon recommendation from one of the waitresses I ordered from, I've tried the Hot Gold... they're the reason I'm sitting down to write this review! It takes a lot to convert this former Western New Yorker wing snob to something other a regular hot wing!

iPiQF9yYhgYymiNwqWJLyw.text: Great chicken flavors. Definitely a dive bar that I would go back to whenever I'm in Charlotte

dryqUbD4pwgeLP-u9EtPjA.text: This spot looks like a serious dive, but if you like Chicken, Wings, Apps and Great Food, then this is a must stop! Love the Buff. Chicken Sandwich with homemade bluecheese!! Can't wait to try the Wings. Love this spot!!

mQokpUSJeFgtk6Jb_pSRMw.text: Amazing food and even better service! Great place to watch all of your sports too! Amazing beer selection and knowledgeable bartenders!

EpZTotPjxkuIzwspZugLQQ.text: DD Peckers has AWESOME snack food:  Fried Pickle Spears, Wings, and Broccoli Cheese Balls/Fried Mushrooms.....Delish!!! We always get our food to go....so I can't comment on the Restaurant atmosphere.

8m7WGIJshnKqOOifOKPkRQ.text: Best wings in Charlotte, and their other offerings (philly cheese steak, etc.) are pretty good too. Kind of dumpy inside, and in a dumpy strip mall - we just get the wings to go!  Owner and staff are good folks.

CAOB1AGVD7kObLAqnHc3pQ.text: Great dive! Gotta try their hot gold wing sauce...Delicious! Also, don't miss out on their broccoli cheddar appetizer. This is a neighborhood hot spot!

2lNfr-OtwI56QDQM4CDxpQ.text: Best wings around. Been a while since we had eaten here, yelped to find best wings as well as googled and this came up over and over again.  Perfect example of a dive bar if I have ever seen one. Staff was all super nice, they all appeared to enjoy working there, family like atmosphere, lots of regulars. Ordered the fried pickles, onion rings and the hot ranch wings.  Had the fried pickles before, they do the spears, looooove the spears.. they were good, crunchy, salty right amount of breading. The onion rings, they were sad.. greasy, mushy... a few were crunchy and those were tasty but most were too greasy/mushy to eat. The hot ranch wings.. OMG... I woke up this morning wanting them for breakfast. The wings themselves were super crispy... even with the sauce.. the hot ranch was not hot by my standards but had really good flavor.. BF has eaten there many times, never tired and he was said he had been missing out. I will be eating here again in another week or so for sure.

jzXMG2epur8Uka8thmmuOg.text: Ohhh DD Peckers - the Wednesday night trivia SPOT.  The owner, Justin, is a riot.  This place has a dive feel with KILLER wings - just make sure you get them well done! NOM.  Everything is good though - fried pickes, salads, cheese fries, you name it.  As for trivia night - every Wednesday at 8:30PM.  Get there a little early to get a seat and order some grub.  Just an age warning - the trivia is raunchy and oh so fun.  Don't bring your kids.  Come to get your drink on, relax and have a good laugh with Justin on the mic.  This place is a blast.  Definintely recommend checking it out!

_zGc0Xzr6n0KNI-eqyjcLQ.text: Wings A++++ OMG we tried the honey teryaki, ginger, gold, lemon pepper, and hawiann. All were fab. The place itself ok. From what I seen they have a very limited selection of liquor and a small selection beer. Sanitation rating was an 'A' at 90.0 and from what I seen it was clean. It almost looks like a bar with food. We also had the burger, quesadilla, chicken tenders, and fries. Everything was great.

mCGphNtJiK_RyRT7rhUBaA.text: I've been all around the United state's  have tried many different  chicken wing joints this is by far the best one of them all. I had 10 pc hot wings with there onion rings and dipped into there hot ranch sauce it is hands down very very good. this place is a hidden gem I am telling you folks .

UJgJ1PaGkuO5bP8CJNFbDg.text: A total dive with fantastic wings.   They have other options, of course (typical bar fare: sandwiches, wraps, and burgers) but none hold a candle to the wings. To me, the sides are nothing special, either.   The wings are the star for good reason--they're a good size, slightly crispy, generously sauced, and the price point is great. They have a huge variety of sauces, and I don't think you can go wrong with any of them, but my favorite is Hot.   The space is relatively small and the parking lot is kind of awkward, so if you're thinking of catching a game here make sure to arrive early. D.D. Peckers also does a great job with carry out if that's more your style.

qL85ydhkD1Rwjeq8wR5MKQ.text: I've been going to Peckers for years, seriously, these are the best wings in Charlotte. My personal favorite are the Hoisin honey and garlic Parmesan. They come out hot, crunchy, and full of flavor. As others have said, the place is a hole in the wall, but that's part of its charm.

1mhueMZ2JxN2H5aKZalBFQ.text: We've ordered wings here twice - to go, so I can't comment on the dining establishment itself. Wings are the main attraction, and thus I expect more than average. At best, the wings are decent, and a bit overpriced. Teriyaki and Gold are good. Cajun, Hoisin, Hot... very much over salted. In fact, most of the wings here are too salty. But the piece de resistance? It's the customer service - namely, the guy who answers the phone. He's horrid. I know, it's the weekend, and you're busy. I don't expect small talk, or even a smile. Heck, I don't even mind curtness. But, I draw the line at snotty sarcasm. But hey... if snotty sarcasm whilst taking your order is your thing? Then DD Peckers is your spot. However, there are too many other great places for wings (I'm looking at you, Moosehead Grille)! Fool me once, shame on you and all that.....

ylNWO1T6wM6kSvy-ygytPg.text: Truly enjoy the food.  I understand that when we go there, we might not always get the fastest service as majority of times we're going during lunch HOWEVER we like the staff and again, the bar food is fabulous! Also a go-to for carryout (party) wing orders.

0lcOPRkuCinlkEexWgbO6Q.text: Best wing place in Charlotte! I've been coming here since I was in HS and it's always great and consistent. All of the flavors are great; my favorites are the Hot Gold, Blazing and Honey Hot. Along with the wings, the fried pickles are fantastic. They serve them as spears vs the normal chips you see and you have to get the hot ranch as well. Ignore the fact that it's a divey or in a strip mall, the food is fantastic and that's all that matters.

GZpEtYWRWvNWaI-V330Xtg.text: My kids and I love the homemade potato chips.  Those are a must. I recommend the wings with gold sauce. It has just enough of a zip. Also love the selection of beer on hand.

6yYE3-Wjj6JMkCv-U5QITw.text: Read the yelp reviews before going, thanks guys. The wings were crunchy, fresh, and totally worth it!

jA8DXE3R_UZpVrDsby2zcw.text: Man......the staff was pleasant, attractive, tolerant,  (even as they were closing!)   The Fried Corn is KILLER! (n I'm orig fr Ohio!)  Overall very nice folks and good food!  (But Really Now; get some fried corn! You Can Thank me later!)  One nice bunch of folks even gave me a "birthday cupcake" as I was leaving! (Danka!)  Cool Joint!

qTNtlBYCN3lG5tfjnuofKQ.text: Hell yes...this place is outstanding for what it is...  The best wings in CLT and as one of my buddies once said, these folks know how to fry up some food.  Spicy onion rings are killer, homemade chips are fantastic.  I found Peckers just over two years ago on an exploratory trip when deciding if we were going to move to CLT.  I am not saying that eating there caused us to move but hell it did not hurt knowing wings like this would be in the neighborhood!  :-)

0qZXhORrDR6G5D6x2oNw2Q.text: So good! Wings & burgers are the best. Fried pickles & chili cheese fries are awesome too.

mQYH7ePbsJ8D8zJqPMyU3Q.text: Delicious wings and sauces are awesome! Atmosphere is a bit like a dive... The staff is extremely friendly and quick. A great lunch.

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. DD Peckers

e35ri8gUpAel31fwIPhiRg.text: They have some of the best wings I've had in the Charlotte area. Would defiantly recommend them to anyone looking for some good wings.

j36Zhw8v7sa8cP9b6OyoBA.text: Found this gem while I was traveling. I am originally from south of Buffalo so I take wings serious. This place was great and the wings were awesome.  Not to mention the staff was great!  I highly recommend this place. Been on the road for 4 days and this was just what I needed. Cold beer and hot wings. If your looking for that corner bar feel with good food, cold drinks an great people this is it.

uACAwpzxHOt5Ba_LHCn8qg.text: Best wings I've ever had, and their burgers are worth a mention as well! Everything always comes out tasting wonderful and fresh, I typically get a side salad instead of fries and I know it's silly to brag on a side salad but it's really tasty! Especially when compared to the sad excuses for side salads other places dump on my plate. They put genuine quality and effort into their food, right down to the sides, and I appreciate every bit of it!   Their wings are top notch, though it's hard to choose a flavor, Hot gold is my go-to at the moment! But I've never had a wing there that I didn't like!   They're a little more expensive when compared to franchised wing joints, but you're paying more for quality you can taste.

6ToZqs3mNdkztocUWkEBTQ.text: First time here. It's 230 on a Saturday afternoon. The place was packed. Ordered 25 of the famous wings. They came out in less than 10 minutes. Ordered    the hot sauce on half and the pepper flavor was different but all in all the flavor was awesome and had the garlic Parmesan on a few and they tasted great as well. Will definitely come back.

RWRMHkWd02pGIkXP6lOw5w.text: Yesterday was my first experience at DD's. I've heard really good reviews about their wings, and I learned first hand that those reviews are accurate. I ordered the hot wings and they tasted amazing! They also seem to have good daily beer specials. Check them out!

3LSFlk6f2CFdOjWWZ3ngug.text: Best wings in town! My husband and I ordered the wings sampler that had 25 wings and 5 flavors. I definitely recommend the hot gold, garlic parm, and regular hot. I also ordered the spice onion rings as an appetizer and would order them again.   It's a small place within a strip mall with 10 to 15 tables max.

sr6aqCRTMvFC1RTNSqRJgA.text: It's a little hole-in-the-wall bar, the wings are so so at best,the service was sort of lacking, it's definitely a locals place, it's a dive bar, so I didn't expect it to be real clean and it lived up to that expectation of course

iltjo9f01JKUw-daRgYFTg.text: These are hands down the best wings in Charlotte. No comparison. I always order the wing platter to get 5 different flavors because I literally have yet to try a flavor I didn't love. Definitely worth the trip out here every time.

wyXkvmfpD8I20dX5iTgdpQ.text: I just tried it for the first and NOT the last time. I never knew it was there. Out of the way strip. So we had a half oder of the fried pickles, very good with a great crisp coating. But a half order is only 3 pieces. Also had a half order of the spicy onion rings. A good amount of thinly sliced onions but not very, if any, spice. The wings were large and meat with a really good sauce and the black and blue burger was outstanding. I also had the house made chips instead of the fries. Also very good. The fries looked like normal frozen ones. Most definitely a return visit is in order. And the service was also first rate. Just wish there was at least 1 or 2 more pickles in the order.

qEpxZumi4cmSHkrgsA2teg.text: Wings! I am addicted.  Here they have a sauce selection that would embarrass many so-called wing establishments. I opted for the sauce-dip all-in-one... the hot ranch. So good. Just creamy and spicy and delicious. Wings are cooked long enough here to render out some fat and crisp up. Nice direct service as well. Got me in and out for lunch like a champ.

tg1HI9jRA7gGi0k28dYB1g.text: We went for wings. The more I ate them the better they got. The waitress was a little slow to get our order and checks when we were done, but we also went late so I'll give her he benifit of the doubt.   Really though, get the wings!

7nWPgzBjKOB4FVdvPazB8w.text: Service is good, prices are good and wing flavors are good. Try the fried goodies like mushrooms, or broccoli and cheese balls.

lkkjE6oAoWJP5TW5htV2uw.text: we went during the PGA, and the place was packed. Even so, the waitresses were polite and quick, anf.the food came out super fast. the fried zucchini is amazing, cut thick and perfect! the wings are really good as well, and they serve steak fries which are my favorite kind. TVs everywhere, since it's a sports bar. My second visit and I'll definitely be back! Recommended by a friend.

T1H15rKVOcbcdpikeXdPdg.text: Awesome little dive for piping hot wings that are delicious. Great prices with just enough of a cozy atmosphere. Don't change a thing guys.

-m2qf6AhfgH-HQQTB50X4A.text: I was not impressed with the chicken wings that I got. I got three different flavors and it was as if they were pulled out of the grease and not drain at all. The chicken was tasteless am I opinion. I've heard great things about the chicken wings....I guess I came on a bad evening.

tOdNk2NOyY78lPB13GbrfA.text: THE best wings I have ever had...  No seriously, I know it's in a shady area, I know it's a dive, BUT! They are the best WINGS you will ever eat.   Justin the owner is awesome, say hi to him.

6mFGgRIfewCZ8zM_XxvF0Q.text: I had the sampler with gold, spicy ranch, spicy garlic, Cajun and lemon pepper wings. The wings were fresh and great flavor! Monday was $3 foreign bottles...It local establishment...I am weak for a dive and local 1 of 1 places...I'll take those over mainstream restaurants

photos.caption: Photo of DD Peckers - Charlotte, NC, United States. Come to North Carolina and they have a banner of my Fighting Irish!

akoXTXwBnyblVeAjWsvoeA.text: Great hole in the wall wing place! I enjoyed the wings because it was cooked perfectly, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Honey hosin looked burnt but it wasn't, loved the taste of it! I'll be back!

wWimB600_5fz-PZGihrbdw.text: I was in town on a work trip and stuck in the suburbs away from downtown Charlotte. My flight got in late and DD Peckers was one of the only places open after 10PM that wasn't closing in the next 30 minutes.  I hate to admit it, but I was not expecting much when I rolled up to this spot. If anything, I was expecting cheap beer and decent wings.  The wings were described as jumbo, and that an order of 10 is usually a good meal. I got 10 wings and a half order of the chili cheese fries.   The chili on the fries was really good. It was chili with beans, which I prefer, but I know it's not everyone's favorite. The fries were pretty tasty with tons of cheese and chili. Definitely eat them with a fork.  The wings were the star, for sure. They were not breaded and they were very crispy, without being over cooked. The sauces were spicy and tangy (I forgot which two flavors I tried, but they were very good). I remember one of the sauces was peppery instead of tasting like tabasco. I really enjoyed that one. It was definitely worth it.  If I'm ever back in town, I'd go back for sure.

CGnnYAHWFrCXiyEJQ06hhA.text: My husband loves coming here for the wings and I love coming here for the chicken tenders tossed in their golden sauce. This sauce has become my new obsession! It's sorta like a spicy honey mustard, but not too spicy, I can't handle too spicy! Oh and their fries are delicious (the fries have to be good in order for me to come back) The restaurant is in a tiny strip mall and it isn't very big inside, but it always seems pretty busy when we go. The service is good and I'm a sucker for dive-ins/bars.

DQ6lhNgLUhG0eOKwxh889Q.text: This place is a bit outta the way, but I'm always on the prowl for great crispy wings, with awesome house sauces, and creamy house blue cheese to dip them in.  A few people had told me to try DD's for the wings and maybe my expectations were too high.  The wings were average at best.  The place seems more interested in being a local dive drinking bar than a culinary gem focused on turning out exceptional wings.  My search continues! Any yelpers that have the low down on really good wings, please let me know.

8vA7eW8f3PV5xAamESZG2w.text: So after driving over 30mins to get here and also 1st time coming here and as soon as we open the door they say "we are closed, we lost power in the kitchen." Seriously, no note on the door or anything ughhh.

ld5qsaaqwkmL76NFyEf0Ug.text: I'm a huge fan of wings. This is the first place I visited for wings since I moved into Charlotte.  Great wings!! Variety of sources!! But this place is not family friendly environment I think. Some wings with teriyaki source was burnt from grill and my kids complained about that. Other than that, I like their wings. Probably I won't go there with my kids, but I will definitely repeat with my friends.

RtbZ1TxlrVDH60Bfgu-jEA.text: Loved it!  The service was great and I had three different flavors... all good! The lemon pepper was great, they put them on the grill for a little char flavor, and it was awesome.  Some of the best wings I've ever had.

egladjGDMMi1Frk9s7u3XA.text: We went here looking for really good wings. Greatly disappointed. We asked the waitress for her recommendations and she essentially told us all the wings were good. We then asked which were the most popular and she gave us some flip answer. The place was not crowded so there was no reason for her behavior.  I will say that I gave this place 2 stars since the service was incredibly quick but the wings are NOT the reason to go there.

SX6XBaubfykYpPZgKg4AYw.text: My wife and I are in town to check out the area and see if we want to relocate here. We are both from the Midwest and always look for a place that has good wings, a low key atmosphere, and plenty of tv's with college football on. This Place has all of that. Friendly workers, great wings, and lots of tv's. If we do move here we will be back

27E94CUB3-_tTvKraQyC2Q.text: Stopped in to watch some football on Sunday and try this place out. What a great decision! Luckily I got there early enough, this is a small little place but man was the food good! I tried the normal hot flavored wings and wow great traditional wings!  My girlfriend got the shrimp po' boy and she loved it! We also tried the chilli cheese fries and dear lord... Too good.   Overall just a really good experience and will be getting take out for some future games! I saw on the menu they do 100 wings for $85! Sounds like a perfect party idea to me.
